reviews.review_text: Try it. It’s light weight and gives you a “your skin but better” look. If you’re looking for full coverage, I’d recommend a different product. I was fascinated all day with how lovely my skin looked under this balm. I think I’ll be buying this again for a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The universal shade is a must for sweaty and oily folks. I use this as primer and after a 12 hour day in a hit sweaty gym - not oily, not sweaty and didn’t need to pat my face dry. This will forever be my summer primer.  This

reviews.review_title: A great all in one product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: People seem divided on this one and I love it. I use it as a primer, foundation, and powder all in one. Usually my skin gets greasy by lunch time but not with this. The tricks is to apply with fingers and blend out with beauty blender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Literally does nothing !!!!! Nothing. ! Heavy - sits like butter on your face  Makes foundation not set  Horrible useless product don’t waste your money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this due to some raving TikTok reviews in which it looked flawless! But this wasn’t my experience, unfortunately. I can get some dry skin on my nose but it hasn’t been an issue over the summer. Before applying the product I used moisturizer and a moisturizing primer but this product seemed to just sink into my pores and showed every bit of texture and dry skin on my nose. It just wouldn’t blend. I suppose I’ll just stick to my BB Cream as this just didn’t work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s definitely not what it claims to be. It’s very oily looking on the skin and when you add more product to get more coverage it’s looks very greasy ( vaseline) . Also, if you have an allergy to fragrance  it contains ginger root oil which caused me to have an allergic reaction.

reviews.review_title: I love all her other products except this one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but it smelled like Noxzeema cleanser and it made my make-up look very dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The make up pills on skin and blends poorly with other makeup. It’s not buildable without looking oily. Yes I’ve tried different types moisturizers, primers, concealers, foundations and brushes.

reviews.review_title: This is a new holy grail for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product and I’ll probably never be without it. The key is to do proper skin prep and then apply it; that means using an exfoliating product and a moisturizer. My skin looks flawless for hours, I’m obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for oily skin. I use this product as a foundation, and I legitimately do see myself reaching for any of my other power foundations. This keeps my skin matte for hours. Even with steam blowing directly in my face at work, dish washer, it looks more like that healthy glow that everyone one wants nowadays. Not nearly as oily as my face can get on it own. Although it doesn't do much for blurring pores. Also, the one time I had a dry patch, which is very rare for me, it did cling and look patchy, so this is not for anyone with dry or combo skin.  P.S. There is such a thing as too matte. If you use this with a matify primer and setting spray, your skin will be too dry and produce more oil. Making it not last as long. Try this with a hydrating primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this solely based on all the reviews saying it’s so good on oily skin. Disclaimer: it’s not. Just remember cream is never ever your friend when you have oily skin. It looked disgusting within 30 mins.

reviews.review_title: BEST of the BEST, take all my money!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This universal primer is the BEST I have ever tried! No other primer comes close to this. Wore powder foundation on top of it for 8 hours and OMG, barely any oil broke through! It is my staple for LIFE

reviews.review_title: Shade 7 is THEE perfect bronzer!! [olive tone]
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omgosh… I finally found exactly what my complexion needed! Seriously, if they ever discontinue this I’ll have to mourn for a veryyy long time. No joke. This is perfection. The color and the formula—so easy to blend, long lasting. It’s “cream to powder” which basically means a cream that dries matte and that’s exactly what you want to go for in bronzer/contour products. I’m a medium tan olive who leans yellow-warm olive but I have some cool tones as well, so I don’t use a fully yellow foundation. This tone is a little darker and more yellow than my base creating the most flawless blend of my tones to match my body. Just warms me up, adds dimension back in, helps everything look more natural. 10/10 🤎

reviews.review_title: Great color, blend ability, coverage and texture!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I adoredddd this! I am very picky with any foundations/skin tints so I was pleasantly surprised. I used color 3 and was happy it was not orange, just a nice medium neutral that was slightly warm. This texture was amazing at blurring texture and providing coverage. It melts as you apply and I use setting powder and spray to secure it in place.

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love it but... they were right.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I  typically have normal to oily skin and live in FL humidity year round,I was happy to see a light coverage option that could address that bc most hydrating formulas leave me an oil slick. While the initial texture of the product is like butter,   if your skin has any hint of drynes or  any texture at all,  this likely isn't for you. It left a powdery residue that clings to any texture and cakes on dry patches. I admittedly did a spot treatment a few days ago and have a few dry patches which is very abnormal for me, and the product created beige flakes on those areas. I will give it another go when my skin is back to normal/ oily. But even still, I am not crazy about the powder finish and the color also runs quite yellow IMO. This could be great for someone with super oily baby skin, that is on the yellow side.

reviews.review_title: Really wanted to love but my combo skin couldn’t
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I work 10 hour shifts in a factory without ac in Georgia and my face gets oily in heat. I use a lightweight moisturizer from cerave and sunscreen from innisfree or supergoop depending on how my skin is feeling.  I’ve purchased 3 times but this is the last time for me. I believe this would work best for oily skin and it appears to work best when used in thin layers which can be built up as needed. In my experience, between the translucent and tinted shades, I have had a hard time getting it to meet its claims. As a primer it looks dry, even under a moisturizing skin tint. As a foundation over primer and alone, it doesn’t last, even with powder. This product enhanced my pores and is not blurring. I would only wear this for short outings no longer than 5-6 hours.  In summary, this is not for me but I can see how it could fulfill a need for other skin types and in other conditions.

reviews.review_title: Sleep on this if you want to…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My makeup did not budge. Oil control was 10/10. My T zone is the first to get quite oily. Oils have packed and left.   For best results, use product correctly.   Thinking of getting skin tone shade if I can match for no make up days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has really grown on me, especially throughout this unnaturally (SoCal) humid summer! When I first got this I was struggling to use it but realized I was using too much! Like with any DMB products, start out with the smallest amount and you probably won’t need more. One of my favorite ways to use shade 1 is after bronzing and blushing, i go over my t-zone with shade 1 to help blur and diffuse sharp lines and bring the whole look together, plus it provides a nice blurring and setting effect for the area with the largest pores.  Shade universal is a great blurring primer, or you can mix it with other products to create a nice lasting blush, undereye concealer, etc!  I recently picked up shade 6 hoping to use a a bronzer — the formula is so amazing that i know this was a great idea, but sadly shade 6 looks a bit orange on my fair skin. I would definitely love for Danessa to create a few more cooler tones in this formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this was introduced by a brand spokesperson in the store that would be a setting powder. Dried my skin out so bad. Tried combining it with their foundation. Did not help. Made creases on my under eyes and just looked horrible. Will be returning in un

reviews.review_title: I’m not sure who these undertones are for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this blurring balm powder but the undertones are just weird. I’ve never seen so many neutrals with olive. No yellow warms just orange. Maybe I’ll revisit if more shades become available

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking forward to buying this because the hype was serious. Limited color range and did not apply nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As the title says, this is my holy grail foundation. I’ve emptied two and my third one is on the way! I have extremely oily skin, and this product helps me look matte ALL DAY without looking dry or powdery. It takes 10-15 minutes after application for the product to settle and sit seamlessly on my skin, but by the time I finish my whole face, it’s set and looks great. I apply it with the spatula included, blend it with my fingers, and finish patting with a damp beauty blender.   This product won’t work for everyone, especially those with dryer skin or flaky texture, as it may emphasize those things. But this product does have a target audience and I would recommend it for oily folks that have trouble finding a foundation that works for them. I never have to blot my face anymore!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loving it. Soft blurred finish, for a really nice no-makeup but airbrushed skin finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This controls for oils through out the day as we fight head and humidity on the daily! I prefer sheer to medium coverage that this product gives! It’s a primer, a setting powder for me tbh and it is a base product! It isn’t ultra drying but controls sebum like a dream! That upsalite in there is no joke!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing it gives you a natural finish and it has upsalite it absorbs sweat and oil . You can wear it under your foundation. My favorite is the universal balm powder i use it as a primer .What i love about the blurring balm powder is that anyone can wear it doesn't matter your skin type is for any skin type .

reviews.review_title: Do it all and even More Balm Powder!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can not tell you enough about this incredible innovative product. Not only does it go on creamy and dry down to a powder,  it also sits well on any skin texture & absorbs oils throughout the day. So ultimately, it looks BETTER as the day progresses! In this Texas HEAT this Balm powder creation has saved my face through 115 degree weather! So many uses for it, prime, set, wear it alone, mix it with Danessas Colorfix pigments to create shadows and blush… The world is your playground with these products & Yummy Balm Powder is the anchor for all of it! Purchased with my own funds. Not gifted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: 10 out of 10 would recommend. This beauty is blurring to help minor imperfections blend seamlessly with other parts of your face. I love how smooth my skin feels when I lay it on as a base before applying my makeup

reviews.review_title: My go to for blurred skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to complexion product for a smooth blurred skin! This balm to powder formula just melts on the skin. Truly a stunning product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is truly unique--the tinted versions leave the perfect kiss of color with a beautiful, natural finish, and the universal...the universal has completely changed the way I wear foundation. I use Universal as a primer, and it is MAGIC. The Upsalite absorbs sweat and oil, ensuring that your foundation not only stays put, but it doesn't separate. As someone who has historically been an oil slick, foundation typically slides off my face within an hour. Not anymore! An absolute MUST.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great for my oily skin. I can wear it for 10 + hours without it sliding around or breaking apart around my nose and chin. Oil does break through by the end of the day, but to a much lesser degree than with other matti dying products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i never write reviews but i felt like this product wasnt getting enough attention.  Oily or combination girls this is for you!  i can't even feel it on my face, it works to balance my oils all day.  Its literally your skin with a filter on it.  a little also goes a long way so i don't see myself running out anytime soon.  i can even use it for touch ups around my nose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Felt heavy on my skin. Tried with sponge and brush. Still felt weird.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this, but no matter what I did, it just extenuated my pores. Never lasted on my nose and caused really bad cystic pimples.  I have combination skin, leaning more on the oily side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this finally with the skin tint and I’m obsessed!!! I went and purchased the translucent one today, I ended up purchasing color 7. It’s very lightweight and perfect for the 110° heat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Their are only three foundations I used and her brand is one of them! Love this product. I need this color in a mini version. it really covers up the blemishes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo oily skin, especially in my T zone. Usually, even when moisturizing and priming my skin, I have to blot and touch up about 3 times a day.   I have been pairing the universal shade with my elf power grip and urban decay spray, and I only have to touch up/blot once for 12 hour days. A little goes a long way, as too much of the balm powder can feel a bit oily on the skin and not dry down quickly.   It can accentuate some texture, particular blemishes. Overall, very pleased that I tried the product out for myself after reading the mixed reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Blurs imperfections and texture! Perfect color match and just what my makeup kit needed. Have great coverage for healthy non oily fresh look. Love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I already loved the blurring balm powder in shade 9 and decided to buy the translucent. Listen here…..it is wonderful as a primer! I have paired it with the Yummy Skin Serum Skin Tint since I have oily combo skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture of this. I use it when I want full coverage. I use it on my acne and textured spots. I chose shade 1 because shade 2 is to dark. More shades are needed but it’s amazing.

reviews.review_title: Best thing ever for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This should have 5 stars! A literal game changer for my oily skin. The light coverage and color match is asp perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its actually so bad I had to write a review and I never write one unless its REALLY BAD or REALLY GOOD. I have combo skin and this really does cling to dry patches and cakes up at every pore and fine line. From afar, its looks good but a close up its flake central. This is probably good if you’re REALLY oily or super oily with clear skin. If you have blemishes and imperfections, it wont look as good. I feel for the tiktok influence sadly. I’ll try it a few more times to test but genuinely, if its not something i can try once and it works or if i must change my routine for it to work then i dont think its good. Super oily people with decent/perfect skin will love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have problematic skin, uneven skin tone, and some crow’s feet coming in. This balm powder is AMAZING! I don’t like to wear a ton of make up, but I needed coverage without product settling into my pores/wrinkles. This is the only product that did the trick, without drying out my already dry-combo skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and I was a bit worried that it may look cakey or dry it out further and it doesn’t at all. I apply just a bit in the areas where I need extra coverage and buff it out with a brush. Then I apply my foundation on top. Honestly, you could even wear it without foundation as well. The shade I have now blends seamlessly into my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am enjoying this smooth powder that feels like a light foundation. Good for oily skin and can be layered if you want more coverage. It's unique and like nothing I've tried before. The colors are lighter than expected so I got a color one shade darker than I had originally purchased and matches my skin well. If you are looking for light to medium coverage for oily skin this is a nice product. No scent which is nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product twice and had to take it back. It did not blur my pores but magnified them! I tried using it under my foundation as well as on top to see if it would make a difference but it did not. I had high hopes for this powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: getting a natural and smoothe everyday look with the yummy skin 🎀

reviews.review_title: the light shade is SUPER light
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used it 2x and even though I could pass for a vampire in Twilight, this is a bit too light for me. I also think it makes my face look dewey aka greasy, so I cant imagine wearing this under foundation. I might get a darker shade, because I do like how its easy to apply (with your fingers).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is it a balm? YES. is it a powder? YES. Is it THE BOMB??  YESSS!  Finally a product that controls my oily T zone and lasts!  Feels like silk going on and just grips all day.  Definitely a game changer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Whether I'm looking for a quick look or full beat (very rare for me nowadays) this is a STANDARD product for me. I apply with a brush and it blends out my complexion perfectly. I get compliments on how smooth my skin looks. I love, love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must have for oily skin! Kept my skin matte through convocation day and night. Was recommend this primer by TooMuchMouth on Youtube and she definitely was right! Use it as my initial primer after prepping my skin with moisturizer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is not suited for me. Clings to any dry patches. Highlights pores and fine lines. I have combination skin and would def not recommend.

reviews.review_title: Must have Primer for Oily Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had been trying to find a primer that would help with my oily skin and dealing with sweat during the summertime. Let me tell you this primer made my makeup stay on all day ! Love it !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this Blurring Balm Powder. I have an extremely oily t-zone, and this is the only thing that controls the oil throughout the day. I wear it under my makeup and it has been a godsend. My makeup stays matte and velvety throughout the day. I even wear this to the gym, and my makeup doesn’t budge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that there is so many different ways to use this product! This is my go to foundation! It glides right one and it looks like skin! I feel like I am wearing nothing when I use this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BOMB!!! I LOVE THIS!!!  IT'S EVERYTHING IT'S DESCRIBED TO BE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used a product that kept my t zone matte so long. Usually I need to blot like 20 minutes after doing my makeup. Now I start to blot 6 hours later, which is an eternity for my oily skin. Thank you Danessa!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: as an oily girl i really love how well this product is able to keep my oil at bay, with the only caveat being that is does in fact get patchy/cling to dry areas. still with how well it keeps me from looking super greasy or oily i don’t think it’s too much a problem; just avoid going over dry spots with it

reviews.review_title: Finally a foundation that keeps my face matte!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have constantly struggled with getting a foundation of some kind that won't try to melt off my face a couple hours later because of my rather oily complexion and hot Texas heat. This product however has been A GOLD MINE for me and now I dont that problem anymore!! Thank you so much for making this as its finally a product that does exactly what it claims to do! My makeup stays matte and pretty all day and im not having to reapply it every 2 hours. Its truly amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry skin, I do not recommend. It highlights the dry areas on my face and really gets stuck in my pores even when using a primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 2 words. HOLY GRAIL. Periodt. This my favourite face primer. I love how smooth and airbrushed it makes my skin look and it keeps my oils at bay for a very long time! I only start to get shiny after 12 hours! I highly recommend this for my oily skin girlies 🥺♥️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Must have for oily skin! The best matifying product i found in store, also really good for blurring underneath the makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!!! Only product that doesn't create a weird texture underneath my foundation yet at the same time controls my oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the translucent to use as a primer. It doesnt look like much,  but I have found nothing to keep the makeup on my face in the typical problem areas (nose, chin, etc) that works as good as this.  I have dry skin. Applied under my foundation and hours later my foundation looks as good as when I applied it in the AM before work.   I don't find this drying at all. Will totally repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it, but not for my oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product. As someone with extremely oily skin I’m always looking for products to keep me more matte. With it without a primer I don’t think it did much to control my oil. The worse part was the way it would cling to the texture around my nose and chin. I just couldn’t smooth it out. It also felt a little thick. I ended up returning i. The color match was great though.

reviews.review_title: Was Skeptical but it's awesome for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really debating if I should get this because the reviews were all over the place. I have very oily skin, products often feel like they want to melt off of me or feel slippy after a few hours or during hot humid days. From reading the description as well as listening to what Danessa had to say about the product I decided to try it. I love it. If you apply it on bare skin it comes out more matte. If you use a primer first it will come out more dewy depending on the primers/skincare. I apply it with my fingers first then use a powder puff to pat it in. Similar to using a makeup sponge. It lasts all day. It doesn't feel like it is melting off after a long hot humid day. I really like it. I may play with it more and try it as a primer or setting powder and see how it goes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: All the good and bad reviews are accurate.  It looks amazing, and it does what it says it does, but it also settles into pores and accentuates areas of dryness. l am keeping it because my skin needs change throughout my menstrual cycle. I loved this product  when my skin was oily and exfoliated, which was the case when l tried it at the store. It left me looking like l had an IG filter on my face. However... things changed a couple of days later. It settled into my pores, and it started accentuated peeling areas (which reminded me where I needed more exfoliation)  With that being said, this product will only look good on good skin; well hydrated (by drinking water) moisturized, and exfoliated. I love that l don't need a primer nor to settle it with power, but l might use a primer to see if it doesn't get into my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily oily oily skin- like wake up oily. This is the first product to keep my oil at bay in the FL heat and humidity. I use the translucent one as a primer w my dior foundation and it’s perf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I was hoping to find a light coverage foundation that would blur any discoloration or fine lines. I have pretty good skin, more on the dry side. First I tried the neutral color, which did absolutely nothing. I exchanged for the lightest shade and my woodness this product looks awful on my skin. It always comes out patchy no matter how I apply, and it settles into pores I didn’t even know I had. Wish I’d returned it but I felt bad after already exchanging. Might just throw it out. :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have trouble with sweating. I tend to wipe my makeup away. I didn’t sweat this this. It’s my own miracle product, seriously. I would be so embarrassed with my sweating. I don’t know the technology works but I am forever greatful. This will be a staple forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin and only need a little bit of this and it will stop the oily shine from forehead, chin and nose all day. If u use too much it’s really powdery and dry so less is more. Great price!

reviews.review_title: Great for oiliness, pores, minimizing scars
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the colors and dislikedthat it did not match but loved the minimizing of oils and pores. I bought the translucent and love it my skin looks so nice and it’s a great primer under makeup I even use it without make up I

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am on the fence with this product. One thing that it does very well is control oil. I put this on in the morning and I did not have to blot every couple of hours. I actually wore it all day without blotting and was noticeably less oily. I did not like the feel of this product on my skin. I could tell I was wearing it all day and I prefer a lighter feel. I gave them 3 stars d/t the feel of the balm and color selection. The 8 was a bit warm for me. I feel like I would need a 7.5.  I would try this product again if she came out with more color selections and may try it in the winter to see if this would be great for me. If you want oil control and the color selection works for you, it is definitely worth trying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love the more matte finish of this. great under liquid foundations and great on its own. it took me a while of using this to really like it and make it a part of my routine but i am glad i didn’t give up on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Agree with other reviewers that a good skincare routine is a must for this if you have dry aging skin. I use CT magic cream followed by this balm and apply with a big medium density blending brush. A little goes a loooooong way

reviews.review_title: Steadily falling for DMB products! Try this one 💗
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super happy that I watched Danessa's and other influencers' videos before deciding to try this product! I absolutely loved the final effect!  Swish your finger across the top glossy layer before using. Manually apply to dark spots (under-eye circles, uneven areas, etc.) and allow to set for a minute.  I used brushes similar to her vids for an even cleaner application. It provided significant ease in placement and blending! Used Shade #6 for brightening areas.  Oil control all day as many people mentioned and subtle lightening up of the shade that is mostly inconspicuous.  Very compatible with other skincare and make-up brands applied under and over it!!  The units are pretty large so you get a lot of product!  Enjoy!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i really like this product, it’s so smooth and has great coverage and doesn’t get oily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This didn’t work for me! It actually made my skin look worse after - emphasizing dry patches that wouldn’t have been visible without it. It also didn’t really help mattify for more than 30 mins. I’ve tried applying this many different ways: with a brush, sponge, and my finders. I also tried to make sure to prep my skin with hydrating products but this product just isn’t it.

reviews.review_title: Holy Grail for oily T-Zones everywhere
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, honestly I hope this is never discontinued for the rest of my life. After 2 weeks of using this, I threw out all my other primers. I work 10 to 12 hour shifts and this is the only thing, among primers and powders, that hasn't disappointed me in some way. I apply a thin layer on my t-zone under my regular powder and I don't see oil breakthrough the entire day. If anything, I only see a slight, natural looking glow at the very end of my 12 hour shift, which actually makes my makeup look even prettier. It's surreal that this makes me look nicer as the day progresses, I've never experienced anything like it. It's been a month now and I've barely made a dent in the product - so it's definitely worth the price. One thing I will note is that it has a very very minuscule scent, almost herbal, that you can really only smell if sniffing the product directly, but I think it's lovely and makes me feel like I'm applying skincare. Truly holy grail, I'm never looking back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the universal shade to use as a primer, and it’s doing a great job! This does so well with controlling oils and withholding against sweat. Almost no oil breaks through, even on the day I wore makeup for 12 hours! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Oily gals, your skin but better!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for a few months and love it so much. I will be picking up another shade for summer. I kind of want to try the translucent shade too.  My only complaint is the shade range. I feel the line could use some in-between shades or more undertones to be a bit more balanced and well-rounded out. I have combo skin....oily t-zone, dry under-eyes, dry perimeter of my face, especially where my forehead meets my hairline (I had eczema as a kid, and once in a blue moon, I get stress-induced flare-ups). However, as always, skin prep is key. I don't see people on the drier side, especially if you have flaky patches. This may emphasize dry texture, especially if you aren't doing hydrating skincare prep. However, as an oily gal, this product has impressive oil control. I don't set it in the winter, but I do so (lightly for outings/parties or dinner) during the summer. This quickly became a go-to fave because it wears very well and feels weightless on the skin, and is versatile. It can work for no-makeup makeup, but also for my full glam, too. The coverage is med but can be built up.  (Pics are from different wear days, ofc)

reviews.review_title: Don't use if you have any texture on your skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a miss. It emphasizes any imperfection or texture on my skin and creases throughout the day. It was recommended by a makeup artist on Instagram, but was a big disappointment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I’m super impressed using this as a primer. 8 hour shift with NO OIL spouts and didn’t have to use my powder. Must have ladies!! Use this as a primer, use setting spray, and top off with setting powder!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best primer i’ve used since having to give up the Becca Evermatte primer, which is the only thing that works for me. I don’t have to blot with this primer AT ALL. And it makes my foundation go on so nicely. I will say, only the Universal shade does this for me. i’ve tried one of the tinted shades, and i found it’s performance to be mildly disappointing.

reviews.review_title: WOW on dry mature skin w a proper skincare routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m only wearing Dior concealer under my eyes, the Universal DM in my t-zone and Dancing Queen on my lips and cheeks. Any questions? THIS BALM IS AWESOME  - I rarely write reviews as I’m a tough critic. After reading what other people are saying, I agree that this project is absolutely incredible IF you are bringing your skincare routine A-game to the party. I absolutely LOVE it, but I can see how this product could highlight flaky, dry skin on those who choose to ignore a good skincare routine. So do that first, then try this!   I have insanely sensitive, dry, rosacea-prone and hormonal skin. I’ve been using Bellini, Dancing Queen and the Universal shade and all three products beautifully blur pores and manage my oily t-zone throughout the day. I use the colours on my cheeks and lips, and the universal on my t-zone, chin and forehead. No reaction, no BS and no concealer - see for yourself.   Totally recommend if you incorporate high-quality, regular exfoliation and a proper moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I should've listened to the reviews on here instead of Reddit where people said it was their HG for oil control. First of all, this product smells like automotive grease, which a few people had mentioned. Since smell doesn't bother me too much, I decided to give it a try anyway. I'm not sure that it controlled my facial oil production enough to shell out $36 or smell like a car all day long. One time I put too much on, and my face looked like a puddle of oil. If I put it on just right, it works okay...I just can't use powder as this product will cause the powder to settle in my pores, and you can actually see the little dots (mind you, my pores are like non-existent). I would not recommend this product at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am one of those people who is SO oily, and nothing helps. By the end of the day, I'm glistening like an oil field and you could probably get a proper sample size of oil off my face. I don't know what kind of magic the technology they use in this product is but it literally controls my oil completely. So completely that it makes me dry!  If you have combo skin or oily-dehydrated skin like I do (the same areas on my face will have flaking, dehydrated skin but also be very oily) then I suggest moisturizing very well beforehand or using this only as a primer under a more dewy foundation/bb cream. Personally, I've used this as a full foundation, as a light layer similar to bb cream, and as a primer under other skin products. For my skin type, I find what works best is using it in a light layer like a bb cream, and this way I get the benefits of the oil control without the negative side effects of looking dry/matte.   If you're dry at all I would stay away from this product - I've also found it has a built-up effect after multiple uses. I was becoming less oily in general even when I wasn't wearing the product, just from using it every day. As much as I'd like to be less oily I wasn't a fan of completely losing my oiliness (even if it clogs my pores it also makes my skin springy and dewy) and using it in a thin layer also solved that.   I was never a huge foundation person and could never find anything that worked. This works. It's a solid holy grail product for me and I will repurchase it over and over again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg, I have tried so many primers for oily skin and this one is the only one that controls any grease on my skin. At the end of the day, I look slightly dewy. I have also used it on my eyes and it also works great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As much as I wanted to love this my combo skin did not. It emphasizes texture I didn’t know I had. I wanted this to work on my skin but sadly it didn’t. I think normal skin would def benefit from this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really do love this product it hides the pores and literally stays on from the time I get up to the time I leave work ! Only thing is I have to apply it with my fingers no sponge or it will not look rite ! Other than that love this product!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Face stays put with makeup. Oils come through much slower. This is a game changer. Not for someone with dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! I tend to only use concealer and setting powder the majority of the time. A woman with oily skin, I have issues with my makeup transferring into my mask.   This balm powder in the Universal tint is a holy grail. It helps keep my oily skin matte throughout the day; I don't have to reapply powder even throughout the 8-10 hour work day. My skin maintains a smooth even appearance even when I take my mask on and off to eat or drink. Now, I'm never nervous about my appearance.  I love this product and keep at least one as a standby if I ever run out. Great product!

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love this. Maybe my summer color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought both 8 and 9. I didn’t know there was an 8.5 and it’s sold out. I definitely need 8.5. In the photo I swatched on my face. 8 is clay like, not as hydrating and ashy. The 9 is not ashy and blends better. But too dark. Maybe use for summer shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very, VERY oily skin in my t-zone.  I had basically given up on being able to have makeup that lasted all day and still looked good.  This product is a godsend! I couldn’t get the tinted versions to look right, but Universal under my other foundations minimizes my pores and lasts all 9 hours of my work day with only a small shine by the end of the day.  AMAZING!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for my Mom and we both used it and love it. Worth the hype Makes your skin look dewy and have that amazing glow. We also got the tinted one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Used product for about 2 weeks. Not for me. After about 4hrs of wear the product turned gray and separated on my skin. Not great for dry skin. Had to return.

reviews.review_title: Amazing as a primer for oil control
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for a few days now as a primer with different foundations. It has truly controlled the oils in my t-zone even on a sunny hot day where I felt like I was sweating. My makeup doesn’t break down as easily. I do see it stick to my dry patches on May nose but all the foundations I use do that too since I have some dry patches due to exfoliating.

reviews.review_title: They shipped me a used product.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I just received it in the mail, the box was sealed but the product was already used. This is so disgusting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has quickly become my holy grail product for an everyday minimal, natural look. I use my fingers to apply a light layer over my sunscreen, and this stays put all day. The only product that I’ve tried that doesn’t crease or emphasize texture. Even blurs my pores, and helps me stay matte all day.   Key is to use a light layer, and I pat it on, rather than swipe it on. This way the tint enables an even complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: It def reduces oil which is great- butttt it also is like a clay mask: like it absorbs oil from my pores but puts dark dots all over my face. Otherwise I would adore this and use it daily! It’s just not something to use on my areas with bigger pores

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry 40’s skin and I need to use my magic cream before this! But for a quick sweep of nice coverage and no spilling in my gym bag- this is a big yes for the summer

reviews.review_text: For years, I have tried every loose powder imaginable overtop of my makeup to get rid of oil. None ever lasted or worked. This product actually mattefies my skin all day even though it’s a primer.  I have never written a makeup review but had to for thus

You would think from first applying it that it would either dry out your skin or turn it into an oil slick by the end of the day,  but I feel like it only makes my face/makeup look better as the day goes by.

I was not a fan of the texture, it felt like I was applying an oily greasy mess to my face. This product did not blur my pores nor did it do anything to increase the lasting power for my make up. Ndt a terrible product but not for me.

reviews.review_text: Seriously overhyped.  I never write reviews but this was so bad I just have to.  It sits on top of the skin and looks smeared on no matter what I do.  I've tried it with fingers and with a dense brush as suggested. Definitely returning, don't waste your money.

reviews.review_text: If you have dry skin stay far away! Even if I moisturizer and prep really well ahead of using this product it still emphasizes dry skin. It doesn’t matter how I apply it or how much/little is used.

reviews.review_text: Leaves a nice finish that lasts throughout the day. Its a sheer finish that can build up. I have it in shade 4 and in the clear one. The clear one is great for touching up or controlling shine without wearing makeup.

reviews.review_text: I picked this up at TMS Chicago and love it.  It works as it states as long as you use it correctly.  A little goes a long way.  I use universal on my clients and their skin looks amazing!  I use #6 on myself and it looks very natural.

reviews.review_title: great as a replacement of powder and foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: excellent for oilier skin. I could see how it wouldn't work for dry skin. I use it alone as I'm not really into full on foundation, and it has a great blotting effect with sheer coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s vital to watch Danessa’s video tutorial because I made a mistake of not watching. I use this everyday and I love it! Helps tone down shine and blurs perfectly with all of my makeup. A little goes a long way and there is a technique on how to apply it.

reviews.review_title: It works as a primer for my oily dehydrated skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the translucent trial size when i did a purchase at sephora as i am curious about this product but i read mixed reviews and worried about purchasing the full size straight away. I have incredibly oily skin on my cheek and T zone and almost nothing works to keep my oil at bay. I tried a lot of high end to drugstore setting powder to no success as the oil kept on coming even after an hour or two. I wasn’t sure about how to use this product as a primer, setting or its own as a foundation. At first i tried it as a setting product and use it after a tinted serum by applying it with my fingers as suggested and it didn’t do magic for me. I’m still oily after a couple of hours but it does looks not as oily as on the side i put on a setting powder. The next day i tried it as a primer also using my fingers before i apply my tinted serum. Still not amazed me. The next day i tried it again as a primer with my fingers too but i warm it up with my fingers first before i tap and blend it on my face, after that i apply a setting powder with a puff then i apply my tinted serum and it really does its magic ! I still apply a light touch of gucci setting powder with a puff after my tinted serum and cream products before moving on to powder bronzer and blush. After that i spray a face mist so the powder won’t look too heavy and after hours I don’t look oily as i always am. This never happens to me. Definitely gonna purchase the full translucent size after this !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute genius and innovative product as well as packaging . Love the ease of this compact… I have used before to prime makeup, last step to go over my foundation to blur. It’s ahhhmaze I’ve!!used it alone as makeup,

Otherwise it is a good product, it blends well and doesn't sit my pores which is a major plus. But because the breakdown around my nose is super obvious, i don't think i'll repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Idk why is this so popular? Mediocre product! Better to use Armani Neo Nude powder foundation or get yourself Dermstore Mineral Tinted Sunscreen that blurs and mattifies all day long. Besides that it looks like nothing special it also smells like shea butter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this because of the hype and had so many issues. Shade 4 was too dark and orange, shade 3 was too light but I tried to make it work. It applies so patchy and thick and even when I could make work, the product did nothing but highlight my dry patches on my combo skin. The worst part is it ended up burning my face! I couldn’t tell which ingredient or if it was a chemical burn or allergic reaction but my skin started flaking and peeling. I got so many tiny painful pimples and my face was so raw and red. I 10/10 would NEVER recommend, especially if you have combo/dry or sensitive skin. Also keep in mind that hyped products are probably being hyped by a brand’s paid partner…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone

This is great for giving light coverage and works wonders for oil control. I’m primarily based in a tropical country and this really does keep my oils at bay in the most humid of conditions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. My skin typically gets oilier as the day goes on and I’ve noticed a significant difference in what my make up looks like when done and at the end of the day. It has the perfect blurring effect and really helps even out any texture. I’ve only used it a few days so I can’t speak to the long term effects and if it will make me break out but before applying it I make sure my skin is clean and moisturized. I’ve only used it as a primer, so can’t speak to other uses of it, as it does have a few others, but from what I’ve used it for it did exactly as advertised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: To each is own. This product works well. Make sure you prep and just don’t slather on your face. Better than any product i have tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's tinted in the container, yet somehow applies completely clear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I initially bought the tinted version but it settled in my pores, so I got the Universal instead. I had to experiment with this product a little before I really saw what it could do. I have large pores on my cheeks, nose, and chin, and this does a great job of making them less noticeable. I have found that it works best if I let the product dry completely, and the drying time is why I didn't give it 5 stars. Once I put this on I usually have to wait at least 15-20 mins before I can put on the rest of my makeup. I may have to use more than most people to fill in my pores, though, so that may not be everyone's experience. Once it dries my skin looks amazing, almost ethereal. It truly looks like a filter is on my face because you can hardly see the pores on my nose at all. There is little to no oily breakthrough after several hours, which is unheard of for me. I will definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In full disclosure I very well might just not know how to use this… I was influenced to buy this and have no idea how to use it. It feels like I’m rubbing some weird salve on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t understand why everyone is hating on this product. It’s perfect for those more on the oily side. Skin prep is always key! It’s a beautiful product that blended in perfectly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This will have you matte all the live long day!! I wore this for 12 hours and was just the tiniest bit shiny by the end of the day. And I have oily skin. Loveee this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After reading reviews I noticed that everyone who didn’t like the product had chosen their shade, and those who loved it had chosen the universal translucent, so I ordered that one. The hype is absolutely real for the translucent and helps with oil control and works as an amazing primer as long as a setting powder is used in the end. Is very creamy and a little goes a long way. Helped my concealer blend in even better than it usually does - reminds me a bit of the unseen sunscreen from goop. Had to leave a review to let everyone know to try the universal FIRST.

reviews.review_title: The ONLY allergic reaction I’ve ever had
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product the 2 times I used it simply because there is NOTHING that kept my oily skin at bay. I’m the kinda girl whose t zone is oily within 1-2 hours after any base application. I first used it under foundation and my goodness other than some minor creasing around the nose, it managed my oil better than any product I’ve ever used.  HOWEVER the first time I used it, upon removal of my makeup I had a MASSIVE allergic reaction. I used all of my other regulars with it and thought “ok maybe i over-exfoliated the day prior or something”.  I then tried wearing it again a few weeks later just to rule out any other possible causes. This time I wore it on its own just with moisturizer, a little bit of my usual undereye concealer, usual setting powder, and usual bronzer.  Upon removal 6 hours later, I had the same awful bright red bumpy hive-like texture and it was back and worse than ever. And it’s so strange to me because in 15 years of wearing tons of mostly full coverage products, and powerful skincare products, I have never ever ever had a reaction to any product.   I’m sooo sad over it. I really loved the application and the way it wore, and the coverage was beautiful—you would never know my skin was flaring up underneath until I removed it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!! This is not foundation! It is not for full coverage! It is not concealer! It does what it is designed to do! You can use your fingers or not and swipe/pat. Itscgreat for  the days you j7st want aittle coverage over discoloration or to set off your full face 10 out of 10

It’s creamy like a thickish balm and as soon as it touches your face it melts into a powdery consistency. Feels wild everything I apply it! I don’t understand how you can not love it! The color is amazing and a perfect unverwendbarere - not too less not too much coverage! Light - Medium is perfect! I’m just blown away to be honest! I have an office job - lasts the whole day 👏

If you have the oiliest skin it might work but it dried mine out so bad I had a rash and texture for almost a week.

reviews.review_title: Ignore everyone else!!! This is ITTT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I’ve read all the reviews. I’m glad I bought it the day it came out and didn’t read any of them, because this product is ITTTT I had this feeling when I saw it online that I needed it right away. I have texture, oily, sensitive skin and I didn’t think I could ever use a product like this. But I had a feeling and I went for it. You have to know how to use, how much to use and you’re good to go as it’s not like anything else.  It rocks my world, it stays on my face, it plays well with my westman atelier cream bronzer, my Gucci powder bronzer, any of the hourglass ambient powder, charlotte tilbury pressed powder, the list goes on. It doesn’t slid, and I’m a girl who uses the nars matte foundation, and still crease.  I’ll say it again, you have to get used of how to apply it, you need the tiniest amount ever. If I have any red pimples or my nose is a little more red, I do go in with a little concealer but only when I want a more makeup look.  GET IT!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A must for oily skin girls
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you have oily skin you will love this. I’ve tried every primer under the sun for oily skin and nothing has controlled my oils like this. I have the shade 3 and also the translucent “universal” shade. I found that the skin tone one would settle into my pores if I used too much. The universal one tho is amazing as a primer. It blurs your skin and keeps my skin matte all day. I’ve never used it over foundation like it also suggests because that just seems weird to me. But if you’re an oil slick like me use this under foundation as a primer with Este lauder double wear foundation on top and your makeup will not budge. I even got caught in a rainstorm with that combo on after 8 hours of wearing it and my makeup still looked like I freshly applied it. Just trust me. If you’re oily you need this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

It is great for travel as it is not a liquid.  It does seem blurring, but the key is to not use too much.  I will even bring this camping to cover a bit of redness without looking like I am wearing makeup.
