reviews.review_text: This is truly a beautiful product. It really gives a natural, semi-matte finish and is pigmented enough to tone down by dark circles. I’m knocking one star off because of how little product is in the packaging. Since this is a cream to powder, I feel like the product quickly absorbs onto my finger tips when applying. I also feel like I have to use a lot to cover my face. And, I don’t think this is the type of product you want to use your fingers to apply with. Like I said, this product is like butter (which is a good thing I guess), and it takes a lot to build up but it’s also messy. Either way, I’m going to buy this again. I just don’t know if I’ll be using it often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have repurchased this product 3 times it is THAT GOOD!  For the record, I have combo, aging skin as I’m in my early 40s.  I prefer a lightweight, light-medium coverage foundation and this gives exactly that. Keeps my oils at bay all day and looks great.  My only recommendation is to apply with a sponge for best results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I reallllllyyy wanted to love this. After watching videos of Danessa Myricks talking about it and using it, I was sold. But then I tried it and let me first say that it has a scent like kinda mechanical which was kinda weird but I can usually get past the scent if the product works well. But I tried this a few different ways and I was just really disappointed. It was kinda cakey and patchy. It was like it was sitting on top of my skin instead of sinking into it. It clings to any dryness and creases in all of my lines. I wanted to love this so much but it was just a big flop for me unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product ,I am loving the results! It has helped keep my dry skin feeling hydrated., glowing and the Application is soooo easy,love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: was so excited to try, I got the lightest shade but was way to yellow tonned for my skin and clung to every dry patch on my face. Tried with multiple different moisturizers and still made my skin flake 🙃  will be returning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to use this product after seeing it on tik tok. I have combination skin with dry patches around my chin and forehead. I was really disappointed with how much this accentuated my dryness. It was very hard to blend out as welll. I think it did a good job of blurring my pores, but it just didn’t look great with makeup on top

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this as soon as the box arrived, and I am very impressed! The packaging is very nice quality, and I like how the applicator is sanitary and attaches to the lid. A little product goes a long way. It does dry down to a matte / powder finish. I think this makes a great base product if you like something light coverage for everyday use - but with a concealer you could use this for a more 'full coverage makeup' look. I blended it out with a foundation brush and was impressed at how easy it was to distribute and blend - can't wait to try it out with a beauty blender next. Seems like it would be great to travel with as well. Will be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't recommend at all. just does NOT hold up. it creases and feels oily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t understand this product . I thought it was a powder but it’s a very greasy balm that does not cover , or do much at all .and frankly I’m a little confused .I am so glad I did not pay for this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not great but not terrible either. Made my skin and my makeup very shiny and oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Christmas gift, been using for about a month. It does blur a tiny bit if you use enough but the smell is awful. It smells like my mechanic husband when he’s worked on an exhaust. I’ll use it til it’s gone but won’t purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t see much of a change at all. The smell is the worst… smells like strong chemicals!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was a total waste of money. I bought two shades, I skin prep and do everything correct, and thus just looked so uneven on my skin and didn't blend easily. I have balanced to dry skin....It's a big nope for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love it, however, the smell was horrible. It smell like bug spray on my face and it threw me for a loop because it wasn’t an immediate smell, it took a few mins before it really registered to me.  I was so confused   I

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overrated. Nothing special. Just get Elf. Does not blur anything.

reviews.review_title: Love, love, love this so much!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. If you're an oily gal looking for light to med coverage AND shine control THIS IS IT. I wear this alone and it looks more beautiful than any other skin tint or balm foundation I have tried because of the shine control. I am hooked, mama!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product changed my makeup game. My makeup went on smoother and my skin stayed matte and stayed on all day! My only complaint is on dry patches on my cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was truly the biggest waste of money I’ve ever wasted here. The chemical-y smell was unbearable and I couldn’t get past it to use more than a coupe times :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as a primer and when I tell you my face stayed matte the whole night! I’m very oily and usually need to blot after an hour, but this kept me oil free for hours! Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this but unfortunately couldn’t get it to work for me. I have normal skin but can get dry spots and this just picked up and accentuated every one. I couldn’t get it to blend in, it kind of just sat on top of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this balm.I apply it with a sponge or foundation brush (the Sephora #66 works great) and buff it into my skin. When I'm done, my skin looks dewy but natural.  While I spend most of my day either in my office or in online meetings, I'm often called on short notice to provide info at televised council committee meetings. This balm—along with a little cream eyeshadow & blush (Lys Beauty makes a great version)—allows me to look good in all three settings without looking washed out, tired or over-made up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I never don’t get compliments on my skin when I’m wearing this. Literally, I will be stopped mid conversation to be told how good my skin looks. It’s also not heavy on the skin. 10/10 will repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Blurring but not great for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm giving this product 3 stars as it successfully accomplishes its claims to be blurring and mattifying and I do love the feel of the balm. But as a woman in my 40s with dry skin, I found once the balm became powder and dried down, it actually seemed to dry out my skin even more and emphasized dry patches. I can see this working well for people with oily skin as it truly is mattifying, but I did not like it for myself and returned. I would still recommend it for people looking for oil control with light to medium coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The concept is great but the result was a disaster. It settles into my pores and then they beg for attention like the annoying neighbor kid you knew growing up that followed you around making farting noises. Cute but annoying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Cons: Transfers like crazy, limited shades Pro: So many compliments on my skin with this people think its natural  Tip: use a buffing brush to apply comes out better than with fingers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: as an oily af skinned person this product is an essential step of makeup application. I use it mostly as a primer before foundation. it smooths my texture, slightly evens out tone and helps control my oils. I use a damp sponge to apply and use this sparingly! too much can look cakey and dry. I will not live without this product.

reviews.review_title: Danessa Myricks can take ALL my money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Found this product from Tik Tok and let me tell you, the girlies DID NOT lie. This product is AMAZING! Super lightweight on my skin and perfect for light make up looks or to layer for full glam looks. Big plus: my oil-spill looking skin looks normal after 8 hours of wear!! Literally flawless and no transfer, even without using setting spray and just the balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I didn’t know how to use this! Is it a primer is it a foundation is it a bronzer do you scoop do you blend do you put on with a brush? I honestly hate that this was marketed for so many different things because you really can’t get a handle on the product. Nevertheless I use the little spoon scrape out a bit mix it with my foundation and keep it pushing! It’s beautiful and it sets nicely. I got the universal shade because I didn’t know what to do with the other shades lol. I like it. It’s a lot in the package I can see myself using this for a while!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you have oily skin, you might like this a lot. I have super oily skin. I use this UNDER my real foundations & so far. It keeps my makeup from separating & oil to an absolute minimum. Haven’t worn it alone but I do love it underneath the foundation method!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like using this when i dont wear makeup/foundation because it hides my uneven skin tone and it feel light and perfect for my combination skin. Did not break me out. I just wished they make a travel aize version because so that when you travel you dont have to bring the whole big container.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product. I have been looking for a light to medium coverage base and I thought this could be it. But no. I'm 39 with some skin texture (pores on nose) & it just wouldn't blend into my skin. I've tried it with a brush and a sponge but it still did not work. Had to declutter so someone else can enjoy it. One advantage of this product is a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: A must for oily skin girls!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have super oily skin, and I have tried every mattifying product out there, and nothing seems to really work without me needing to blot midday. I picked this up on a whim and WOW! I'm obsessed. I put it on top of my foundation to help blur, using just my fingers so a little goes a long way. I swear my makeup lasts so much longer and I don't look like an oil slick by the end of the day. Will definitely be rebuying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I have very dry skin, and applying this with fingertips gives great coverage without leaving me dry or flaky looking. It feels extremely light on the skin, and looks flawless all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good lightweight option instead of concealer and foundation. I use the tarte spf powder on top to seal it in and add sun protection. It stays all day and helps with my dark spots and acne scars. Not my favorite on its own

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this balm but it made me look ashy. I also broke out for a few days shortly after using it.

After using this product to the pan, I will say that overall it is heaven sent! I have a very oily t-zone and I can get through an 8 hour work day looking the same as if I had just put on my makeup. Buy it!

reviews.review_title: FOUND MY HOLY GRAIL FOR WATERY EYES!
reviews.review_text: I’ve been wanting to try this blurring balm the longest and finally got it. I use #6 for highlighting. I purchased 6 & 7 because it was a little difficult guess my shade just based off the pics on danessa’s social media and Sephora’s pics. 7 is my overall shade. This balm is the bomb!! Lol! I haven’t worn foundation in awhile due to my watery eyes that always ruin my makeup for me. No matter the setting powder, waterproof foundations and setting sprays. This bad boy keeps my face flawless all day long. I typically work 8:30am-9pm. And surprisingly it’s gets better as the day goes by. I love it!
This is beautiful. It has build able coverage, and is light weight on the skin

reviews.review_title: perfect, just need more for the price
reviews.review_text: only complaint i have is there should be more product and the tub should be more shallow to fit the product

Interesting product and it smells nice. The consistency is like a cream to powder and goes on somewhat smooth but definitely clings to any dry patches and texture. I don't normally have issues with this either.. I especially noticed that it clung to my inner nose folds and looked rough. I'm not totally in love with it, and for the price point..... but you do get a ton of product and only need a little to cover your face. I didn't like the way it looked when I built the product up on my face, it seemed to be more flawless with just one application. I applied using my fingers too, not sure which brush would be best to buff this out if I were to use one? As for oil control, it does the job nicely without any extra oil peeking through, although I've only had it on for approx 3 hours since writing this review.

reviews.review_title: must have for oily mature skin
reviews.review_text: It took me a while to love it but now it's holy grail status. I have oily mature skin and I find it difficult to find a mattifying primer that works and doesn't dehydrate my skin. I use this on top of my tinted SPF. The effects aren't immediate. My skin is not completely matte nor blurred when I first apply it, but as the day passes, my skin looks less oily, more blurred and hydrated than without the primer, it's incredible.

I DESPISE this product. I wanted to love it so badly that I tried every single base possible. Moisturizer + serum only. Moisturizer + serum + non silicone primer. Facial mask + serum + moisturizer. I have oily/normal skin and this dried up my skin and created crusty spots and made my pores scream HELLO, BONJOUR. There is no way to use this product. You cannot layer it and you look worse with it on. Perhaps the formula can be repurposed for stage aging makeup. Gorgeous packaging—so gorgeous I don’t want to throw it away. But it’s massive and a reminder that I need to do more research before buying something.

I was looking for something that I could wear in lieu of foundation that provided a bit more coverage than a store bought BB cream.  It made my skin tone appear even, but 1) it had a chemically smell and 2) it made me break out with cyst type acne, which I’ve never had in my 42 years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely amazing! I was debating between Shade 6-7 because I agreed with prior reviews that there should be another shade in between until I researched, watched youtube videos and tried it out myself.  Because it’s buildable coverage it truly does work for a wider shade range. The texture and natural finish is like no other and I’ll be repurchasing this for sure.  I have normal/combo skin,  used Fenty: 360  Armani: 8.75  Rare Beauty: 400W  Too Faced: Born This Way: Caramel  Give it a try you won’t be disappointed! It’s a total game changer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Agree with the other reviews that my pores were more visible after using the product.

reviews.review_title: I really wanted to love it, but…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this product in numerous configurations with and without serums, moisturizers, foundations, etc. in every instance it immediately settles directly into my pores. Since starting the use of this balm my pores have been increasingly more clogged  I wanted to love it, but it just doesn’t work for me at all.

reviews.review_title: Not for oily skin or big pores
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried twice with and without primer and it was a disaster. It makes all my pores noticeable contrary to what is expected for. Had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product that does everything it promises. Primer, pore filler, foundation, oil repellent. Variety of shades to suite your need. Get it, I promise you won’t be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this in shades 9 and 10 because i wasn't sure which I'd need. 10 works soooo well. For me it did all of the things it said it would do. my skin looks amazing and I don't feel like I put nearly as much effort into my makeup for it to look this good. This is a permanent addition to my makeup arsenal!! I'll exchange the 9 for another 10 instead of getting a refund (it's THAT good)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Saw this product get hyped on TikTok so I decided to try it. The product did not work for me. I’m glad I’m still within the return timeframe to get my money back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely blended well and gave a nice matte finish but there is something off with a strange smell of bug spray...once u apply it, you get a whiff of it, then it disappears but something is added to it...so be weary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve attempted to use this product many different ways , as a primer alone , mixed into product but for some reason I am not seeing any blurring and my face still gets greasy during the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I guess im one of the unlucky ones that this product didn’t work on. I keep trying to make it work but the result is always the same. It made my skin very textured. So sad cuz i got the clear one and the light-med but both pf them just didn’t work out for me.

reviews.review_title: Great product but you need a good moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for about 3 months, I can say it is good for putting on before your make up but AFTER applying moisturizer!! I can see why some had issues with it when comes to skin irritation. Moisturizing is key before applying this product.

reviews.review_title: Try translucent if the shades dont work for you!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I initially bought shade 1 and it looked horrible on me. Dry spots and pores were all emphasized. I tried everything to make it work. Bare skin, moisturized skin, with fingers, with brushes, with a sponge. Nothing worked. Gave up but decided to try the translucent and i loved it! Because its translucent,  you dont get the dry patches or the filled in pores look. I used it under foundation and it kept me oil free and flawless for over 8 hrs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the way this makes my skin look if I want something more powdery compared to the Rose Inc. skin serum foundation. My only issue is it has little staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was great for me and was easy to use. The coverage is great for my everyday needs. I enjoy the feeling of breathable skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin look flawless. I don’t know much about makeup but every time I wear this I get compliments on my skin. Perfect for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worst foundation product I've ever used. Sinks into pores and fine lines, doesn't work well over matte primers or sunscreen so therefore is terrible for oily skin. Needs additional powder simply to even out the look. Went on terribly with my fingers. Better with a foundation  brush and sponge, but tons of pilling, Took longer to apply because of these things than traditional foundation. Returning it. You must have flawless skin for this product to work, I;m assuming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Omg, best stuff ever! I was scarred cause some reviews say it makes skin look awful. Nope, poreless flawless skin that lasted all day! This stuff is amazing!

reviews.review_title: Really do like the blurring effect.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this product. First received a mini in translucent and decided to purchase a full size.  Glad I did.  Not sure exactly sure the best way to apply, but have been using alone on light makeup days.  Very happy with the results and the silky feeling when applied.

reviews.review_title: This is a miracle for all the oily skin people!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried everything for my oily skin over the years, mattifying lotions & sunscreens, matte foundations, lots of powders, oil controlling primers, setting sprays with powder in them (mac fix+ matte and elf blotting spray), blotting sheets, milk of magnesia (back in the day iykyk :o), even considered going on spironolactone for its oil control effects...and nothing has ever really worked. These things keep me matte for 2-3 hours, tops. After that I am blotting my face multiple times a day and powdering every chance I get. Its been an absolute struggle, embarrassing at times....I didn't think anything would work and had begun to accept my skin was always going to be like this over the last few years. I had enough of trying to fight it...  I can't remember how I heard of this product but its incredible!! I got the universal shade to use as a primer. I scoop out a tiny pea sized amount and smooth it all over my face but concentrate most of it on my t-zone. I use the smallest bit of powder to set my face and then use powder again around 4-5 pm. Thats it!!!!!   I will say this is definitely not for dry skin....they should market it specifically for oily skin and maybe create a different formulation with less of Upsalite to cater to normal/oily skin folk. Even with moisturizer and sunscreen underneath (plus having oily skin) I could feel its drying effects on my skin. I have only used it twice so far and definitely will be prepping with more thicker, moisturizing products underneath. I am totally okay with that prep because for the rest of the day I can forget about my greasy face, thats such a relief. My makeup lasts longer, looks better...I can plan out a full day and know that I wont look like a greasy mess. I couldnt stop staring at my face and checking my skin in the mirror every few hours, surprised to see no oil.   This is a miracle product!! Thank you for making this Danessa Myricks!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Great for a makeup no makeup look. Goes on very easy. Gives the son a little oomph without looking like you have anything on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I hardly ever write reviews but I needed to for this product so that it can get the hype it deserves and they never discontinue it. I have combo skin with my t-zone looking like I poured grease on it and this product keeps me from getting oiling and makes my makeup stay on ALL DAY. Seriously. I never touch up my face anymore after lunch or have to worry about looking oily. By the end of the day the little oil the comes through just makes me look normal. I've never had a primer product work this well. Also it looks lovely just by itself for no makeup days or a minimal routine.  Needless to say, this is a new staple for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical because there are so many mixed reviews. I have combo skin that leans more towards being oily. This stuff truly has a bizarre, albeit beautiful, texture that literally shape-shifts on your skin. This stuff smoothed out my texture and large pores, neutralized redness, and appears to be soaking up oil. It didn't dry out my dry to normal ares at all. If you have flakiness, yes it will cling to that but what makeup doesn't? You have to have the right skincare underneath, which is key to making any makeup work.   I could see how this would be misused but I also think maybe people are making it too complicated. I grabbed this from my UPS guy, opened the box, and lightly smeared a very small amount on my face with my fingers. Nothing fancy. This was in the middle of my day. I had no makeup and a lot of moisturizer/oil because I was home for the day letting my skin recover from the work week (and my photo evidence reflects that 😜). I'm sure it could be used with a good brush. Don't overthink it and don't feel the need to use a huge amount. Build as needed.   I'll see how this absorbs oil going forward. My skin is VERY oily; so oily that nothing stops it except for Botox. My expectations for oil absorbency are never met and I'm used to that. My first impression is just that it looks like my skin but better and it really suits my textured skin without looking fake or overdone.

reviews.review_title: I tried to like this but it's a hard no
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not made for mature or dry skin. I have tried using this product with 3 different primers, no primer, with my serums and without my serums and it looks terrible no matter what I do. It highlights every wrinkle, every pore and every dry spot on my face. I have applied it with a brush, a sponge and my fingers. Powder does not set it and wearing it on its own isn't possible because I have an oily t zone. Coverage simply disappears. This is the worst foundation I have used in years.  Zoom in on pictures. Unfortunately, it is too late to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this is the best product ever! I love that this gives you a pure natural look! This is a must buy!! I plan to buy two more colors! Thank you Danessa ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you are an oily Queen like me, you need This product! I have tried every matte foundation/primer/etc there is and nothing has ever worked until I tried this product. I haven’t been able to get my hands on my color shade but I wear the translucent as my primer. It pairs well with any foundation/skin tint. It doesn’t have to be matte! I apply moisturizer and then apply this and let it dry while I do my eyebrows. This is worth every dime!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve bought into the hype of A LOT of products that claim to keep your skin oil/shine free but THIS. IS. THE. ONE!!!!!! The oil does not exist with this product. You can use it as a primer or wear it alone. Give it a try. I highly recommend it!!!

reviews.review_title: Does the job and more for a natural skin look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Soooooo good on the skin for a natural soft look. I’m obsessed. This will be my good to for day and night. A little goes a long way. Very impress if the color pay off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I waited weeks for this to come in stock in my shade and was so excited to get it. I wanted to love it and tried more than once- it just kind of sucks. It highlighted my pores. It somehow just sat in my pores and not on top of my skin and made my skin look really dry when it wasn't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i received a small trial of this in universal with my last order.  I wasn't so sure about it, i came on here to look how it can be used. I have used it as a primer a couple of times and really like it, it goes on very light, i was afraid it would be cakey but it's very sheer. I have combo oily skin type and it definitely kept my makeup looking great throughout the day, it kept my tzone shininess down.  So nice that i got too try it and was very generous deluxe size.  I definitely would consider purchasing, i will next try using it as a finishing powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my foundation pill and come off. Not sure why allure awards had the worse products ever this year

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product after seeing all the tiktok and youtube reviews but this was one of the worst products I have tried. It accentuated every fine line, pore and dry patch on my face. I applied the product my hands, brush and blender and nothing seemed to make it look any better. Unfortunately I had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, not work for me. I am unsure if I did something wrong, but the product was not blended in and peeled off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Just the right product to bring warm, depth and that final touch to ensure your makeup stays on all day. Dont use with a heavy hand. You only need to dust your brush lightly in the compact.  A little spoon is included to keep the product contamination free and to portion out the little amount of product the size of the spoon that you need to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried to love this but it is absolutely NOT for dry/combination skin. The balm to powder gesture is cool, but very strange and sits on skin in a weird way. I also think this product needs a bigger range of colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so badly after seeing how beautiful it looked after others effortlessly applied it on their face. I tried everything with this balm to make it work for me. Tried using it as primer, skin tint, concealer...every single pore and dryness was enhanced. I even used different beauty tools like a damp beauty blender, brush, damped my brush with micellar water/setting spray, and even my fingers to roll, press in, EVERYTHING. It didn't worked either. I thought I had oily skin but this made me question if I have combo/dehydrated skin. The only thing that this helped a little bit was after I applied foundation, if I applied this as a light makeup setter/powder, it did help prevent my face from getting oily throughout the day. HOWEVER, it makes my foundation look so patchy. Maybe I'm using this wrong the entire time, I don't know. I'm so sad to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loooooove this!  I am ready to try all of her products!!!!   It feels so amazing! I love how it’s creamy when I rub it in and then it turns to powder feel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely not for dry skin it leaves kicking us in the areas you have dry skin and look strange. This product would probably work great for somebody that doesn't have any dry skin on their face. It matches my skin tone very well I wanted to love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s light weight, covers exactly what I need it too, doesn’t get cakey, and truly just melts into my skin. Every time I’ve worn it so far, people haven’t even clocked that I was wearing anything. I’ll sing the praises of this foundation from the rooftops

reviews.review_title: Slippery and oily: I don't understand the hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After reading many reviews, I bought this to try it out. I am a lady of a certain age (40+) with combo/oily skin, mostly in the t-zone. The translucent version felt like like a waxy oily balm in the tin but I figured it would dry down once applied. It did not. I used it as primer, applied with my fingers under the Haus Labs TriClone foundation and it slid around and took forever to get all the slippery mix of balm and foundation into something that resembled a polished look. As a busy working mom, I do not have time for this much care and handling to make it work.  I set it with Laura Mercier powder which helped with the shine. However, I had to be careful all day not to touch my face as any slight pressure would restart the slip and slide of makeup and left blotchy uneven spots on my face. It just never settled/dried down. I tried applying as primer under foundation, as a setting balm over foundation, using my fingers, a brush, etc. over the course of a week and nothing worked. I finally returned to a store and the cashier off handedly mentioned that she had processed a lot of returns for this product. Maybe it works for younger people or people with dry skin, but this is not for me. The search continues for the perfect primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal skin and it just didn't work for me! Regardless of application it looked cakey and magnified all of my problem spots.

reviews.review_title: Blurred large pores with one application.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have crazy oily skin with large pores. This stuff here is like magic. Blurred my texture with one application using my fingers only. I did set it, but I do this every time I apply makeup.  Tip to those with dry patches (as I do) MOISTURIZE! Make sure to prep your skin prior to application. This is a blurring balm with moisturizing properties but it is not a full on moisturizer. Try mixing it with your moisturizer or favorite foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful coverage with a light, airy feel! This is a silicone based product, so you must use it with similar silicone products. If you use this on top of a water based concealer, they will start to separate and crack on your skin. So use properly because this is a gorgeous product that blurs pores and helps with skin discoloration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s alright but all the shades are very warm. I wish they had a lot more cool and neutral tones.   The finish also seems very unnatural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin and this was still too dry for me! Clings to dry patches and has no staying power at all even when using a good setting spray! I had to use a glowy primer just so it would look decent. Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this (bought it for my no makeup days to even out my skin), but just not a fan. It stays balmy on my skin versus drying to a powdery feel. I really don’t notice a difference when I apply it to part of my face versus the other. (Maybe a tinted version would be better)?? Won’t be purchasing again unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so much. I heard it does wonders on oily/combo skin but It stuck to dry patches(I didn’t even know I had), emphasized my pours, and ruin my makeup base. I tried many times and many different ways. This products just wasn’t for me unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfectly blurs the skin. Looks airbrushed but is pretty light feeling.

reviews.review_title: Not so friendly for dry/textured skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this. Unfortunately any way I tried it all it did was remove whatever I had on underneath, or made my skin look so dry and textured when that’s not normally the case. Beware dry skin girls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really had high hopes for this product, and unfortunately it fell short. It clung to dry patches and made my face look chalky (I have dry skin). Might be pretty used as a highlight or contour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really tried hard to make this work for me because it does control oil better than any other primer I have ever used and I've used most matte primers that exist on the market. That being said, I've never seen my makeup look worse than when using this product, and it's weird. I got the universal shade to use as a primer and experimented, using less and less (and I used very little from the beginning) each time I tried it to see if that would help, but it didn't. My makeup caked and creased in ways I'm not used to seeing. It completely gathered around my nose and in any fine lines, it made everything I used on top of it much harder to blend, and anything put over it looked patchy. I always prime my eyes with my matte face primer and my eyeshadow also did not blend out easy or well at all (Natasha Denona) like they always do. Also, I'd be careful using this as an eye primer if you use liquid liners or water-activated liners. I could not get my cake liner to glide and stick to my eye and realized like an idiot this primer is heavily silicone based, so the primer was repelling the water in the liner. Your mileage may vary if you're using liquid or cream products, as I use all powder products (including powder foundation) with the exception of my concealer, but I felt like it even made my concealer look bad. My skin felt balmy all day, which further contributed to the moveability of my makeup. In fact, my mascara flaked a little and instead of being able to brush off the flakes, when I went to brush them my skin was so balmy and moist (but still matte which was weird) that the flakes liquified and caused a bunch of black streaks under my eyes. It also made it harder to wash my makeup off. Ultimately, yes, it did blur pores and it did keep me almost completely matte by the end of the day, solving two major issues for me. However, it created a host of other issues. Enough for me to say, even as a SUPER oily-skinned person, I'm going to pass and go back to my old primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I read all the reviews and thought twice about buying this. However, I really love this product. I use my fingers to dab it on my skin and have found it does a better job covering my pores this way. Once it sets I put my foundation powder over it. Makes my skin look flawless and not oily all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Yo… I have been dealing with fry-some-chicken-on-it type oily skin for most of my life. I’ve tried all kinds of primers, powders, and sprays, and nothing really could prevent the inevitable oiliness that would eventually erupt on my face. This. Stuff. Is. Legit. I use the transparent balm under my foundation and I don’t get even a hint of oil. I have been looking for this all my makeup-wearing life. If you combat persistent oily skin you must try this. I’m thinking of ordering another one just in case it gets discontinued (please don’t discontinue it).

reviews.review_title: Don’t get the hype. It’s waxy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Idk where the powder part is. It looks and feels like a tin of chapstick. It’s greasy and don’t do anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product works as stated.  I am so glad I gave this a try.  I would definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Even after a full face prep with moisturizing skin care, this clings to every blemish and settles in every pore. I really wanted to love this and was influenced by social media to purchase. When you look from a distance it looks fine but any close look in a mirror you can see the product separating and cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love it, but it’s a hard pass. It DOES keep my oil at bay, but made my skin looked like a patchy splotchy mess. The worst part of this foundation is the smell. I’m never sensitive to smells, and actually love products th at have fragrance in them, but this stuff smells like gasoline. And the smell doesn’t fade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product, and it does give the appearance of 'blurring' on the skin.  I do think it's helped to control oil throughout the day but only slightly moreso than if I don't have it on.  It's a nice addition underneath makeup, but not necessary. I'm enjoying it now, but not sure I will buy again once I'm out (which seems like it will be a LONG time since you hardly have to use any of this!)  For the price you definitely get a lot of product.

reviews.review_title: AMAZING when you use it CORRECTLY!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a game changer. I don't use anything else but this as my foundation. Those who complained it was patchy or drying likely didn't prep the face properly. You MUST apply this to moisturized, prepped skin. If you slap this on top of dry skin with no moisture, of course it's not gonna feel right! You can apply this with a brush or sponge, but personally I think it works best to warm it up between two fingers (this is key!) and then dot it on my face before gently using my fingers to blend it out. And you only need the tiniest pea-sized amount for your whole face. This is not for the full-coverage girlies, so make sure you're expectations are in check. If you want more coverage, this works great as a primer when used before foundation.

reviews.review_title: Cakey mess, has silicone in it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin

Well this didn't do anything at all to help and instead made everything look dry and cakey. After first putting it on, you get catfished because it looks pefect for about 10 seconds before it turns into a cakey mess. I'm really disappointed. Returning it :(   Also the second ingredient is silicone so take that into consideration. The ingredients online don't always match the product packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

I honestly just wear it with a little setting spray and I run quick errands. This is definitely not needed in your normal beauty routine, ladies. I wouldn’t purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was so disappointing. It wouldn’t even blend into my skin. It made a really gross sticky paste that would just clump in certain spots. I’m so bummed that I tossed the packaging so i can’t return. Do not waste your money, not sure how the reviews are so good
