reviews.review_text: Like putting diaper rash cream all over your face. Okay The WORST. This smells terrible. Looks worse. Every hair and follicle and pore was extremely pronounce and I looked like a dead Victorian queen. All I needed were little felt patches on my face.       crazy washed out,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! It’s easy to apply and it melts right into the skin and works beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must have for oily skin. Usually by the end of the workday my make up looks like it’s starting to melt of my skin. Since I’ve been using the blurring balm powder, my make up is perfect all day. knohow to explain it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a gem!! I’m so glad I bought it! If you have oily skin, THIS product is for you! You won’t regret it. My face can last for a full day without me having to touch it up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this. The shade match is perfect, but my skin is too dry for this formula. It clings everywhere. Someone with oily skin would probably love this though. Kind of bummed I waited too long to return it.

reviews.review_title: Sad to say this did not work for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this out after seeing all of the awesome reviews & was disappointed that it did not sit well on my skin. I use great skincare & prime well but it would settle into fine lines & looked streaky overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although I expected something more typical of a balm, but this is a great product.  It's silicone heavy, so if you don't like that look or feel, you won't like this.  For me, it's been a great replacement for all my liquid foundations and goes on quickly and easily.  It also blends seamlessly.  It is important to do really good skin prep because it is not a wet product, so you'll want to make sure you're using a really good moisturizer under it and give that moisturizer time to settle into your skin before you apply.  I spent an entire day out and about and never needed to touch up or reapply it, so I'm definitely a believer. The coverage level is perfect.  It's light without giving me the over the top, glowy appearance like a skin oil or a liquid foundation would give.  As much as I like that glowy, shiny look, it's not practical in the humidity where I live, so this product is a great way to replicate that look with a product that better suits the weather.  I also have the universal shade and it's perfect for days when I don't want to have on a full face, but my skin just needs a slight bump in appearance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m completely bummed because this did absolutely nothing for me and I mean NOTHING!! For the price I was expecting some miracle product especially by the reviews. Disappointing to say the least! I’ll definitely be returning and trying a different product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought for all the rave reviews. It’s more drying than I expected since is described as a literal balm. I’m going to keep it but will use more moisturizer and hydrating primer perhaps before applying next time. I have sensitive acne prone skin btw!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a small size of this product in the shade Universal / translucent, and sadly, I am not very impressed.  PROS: It has a balm to powder formula. You can see the balm finish in the hand swatch, just applied. It turns into a natural-matte finish once it sets. I do my eye makeup while the product sets. Gorgeous packaging which is also recyclable. Great ingredients: it has hyaluronic acid, olive derived squalane and upsalite. It is a vegan, cruelty free, gluten-free product It is a Black Owned brand. CONS: It did nothing to disguise my pores under foundation. It made the pores slightly less apparent without foundation but only because of the natural matte finish, that could be achieved with any matte setting or finishing powder and better results with other pore refining products (like Tatcha Silk Canvas or Tarte Timeless Smoothing Primer). I never go without foundation so adding the balm does little for me. I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: application process is easy…and the product itself is wonderful, the one thing im struggling with, and it may be my fault, not the product, is it keeps wanting to cake up in my t zone, my nose especially…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product so badly. I tried a few different ways and ended up using it add more coverage to my skin tints. Omg let me tell you I’ve never had a product make me break out more than this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!! If I am having a clean face day I use a light layer, but it is buildable, blendable. It sits perfecfly on my dry skin, although I need a primer, but it does not cringe into fine lines and wrinkles. It gives a long wear without smudging. I wish it could come with SPF

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has cut down atleast 10 min off of my makeup time. It's super convenient. I've used this for full glam and soft glam. It's the best for oily skin girlies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure how this product won awards.  It does absolutely nothing. Maybe a mediocre primer at best but this was super disappointing 😞 Don't waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really do love how it glides on skin and its a perfect neutral shade match for me!! If you like medium to full coverage, you'll enjoy this product. A little for me goes a long way. I have combination/dry skin with a lot of acne scarring, so it does have decent coverage but settles into my pores. It creases like crazy around my mouth. It is also pretty transferrable on its own and tends to get cakey when using setting powder (I was using the One-Size setting powder). Overall, I will still continue to use it because I love the shade, but will use it cautiously during the upcoming dry winter season!!

reviews.review_title: A new must have for oily or combo skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t love it as a foundation / it was just ok. But as a primer, under any kind of foundation, this is amazing! Makes my skin look so smooth and keeps oils at bay. Yes, it actually keeps me from having to blot for HOURS every time I wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical of this product & the hype behind it. I purchased it expecting it to be sub-par or not truly neutral undertones or cakey. I was pleasantly surprised when I tested it out. It's dewy looking without being greasy, doesn't break me out, instantly blurs, and matches my skin perfectly. I also love the packaging as it's easy to use & clean. However, you do need to set this with translucent powder or apply a powder base beforehand to keep it from moving throughout the day (like with most creams/foundations). It is an excellent product if you know how to work with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited for this foundation and wanted it to work so bad but it is horrible. Absolutely Horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff feels cool when you swatch but if you don't wear anything but skincare underneath, she will absolutely settle into every crease and pore you have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this as a primer! It almost smooths out all of my texture and blurs the pores on my cheeks but the highlight of this product is how well it holds my oils. I always have to blot least once when I put make up on, I’ve gotten used to it. But this leaves my skin so beautiful and oil free all day long. Im amazed. I paired this with the Kosas Revealer foundation, a foundation I wasn’t able to make work for me when it first came out due to how hydrating it is and how it transfers easily on my due to my oils. But once I put this yummy balm underneath as a primer, I went 10+ hours looking flawless. No wearing, no transferring, no splotchiness nothing! That’s with the fact that I was even jumping around at SkyZone, sweating. And because of that, I decided to hold off on blotting just to see how my makeup would look at the end of the night. Once I got home, it was as if I could keep with wearing that days makeup for another 5+ hours if I wanted! Will forever repurchase. I will say though, I apply this with my hands like a regular primer so it can get into my skin thoroughly. I have yet to try it with a brush or other ways as others have mentioned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It’s easy to apply but not as much coverage as I’d like for this type of foundation. The smell is what really gets me - strong plastic smell. I haven’t heard of anyone else comparing about this… is it just mine??

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this product is so beautiful and innovative. I have the balm powder in shade 8 and universal. this product makes my makeup last all day and it keeps my oils at bay . for the universal shade, i mix it into my foundation and it creates a beautiful soft matte finish. to make this product work for you , i recommended making sure your skin is well hydrated and prepped. I have normal skin that tends to get oily in my t-zone throughout the day . This is a product that i will always repurchase!   for reference, i wear fenty 385, Lys DN3 , rare beauty 42N

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product applies smooth and even. I could have gone a shade darker but with winter coming, it'll be the perfect shade in no time. Will go with a darker color in the summer though. I applied using fingers and beauty blender and preferred using the beauty blender. Will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely the worst. I’m unsure what type of skin you need to have in order for this product to not look like you’ve rubbed chalk on your face, but this was not for me.

reviews.review_title: Stunning ! But, not for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is PERFECT for a one and done face routine. It's a primer, low coverage foundation, and powder all-in-one but you can also layer over top of it. My skin looks amazing all day, not too dry and not too shiny. The only thing I would have to say against it is that it's not good for very dry skin, the only place on my face where I have really dry skin is around the corners of my nose and I find that the product clings to that area but compared to other products, the clinging isn't too bad and I normally just blend out the area extra and that seems to work just fine.   Also, if you are pale and worried about how dark the product looks online, it actually blends out lighter than it appears in the packaging, so if you were hesitant like me, you might be surprised by how well this matches your skin. I am a 1P-3P in their foundation and a shade 1 in this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had been debating on whether to buy this or not, but I actually like it .Application is easy and its super creamy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this. Truly. I will buy this over and over again. Good coverage for days when I don’t want to do too much. Blends well with fingers or brush. Use a brush if u want fuller coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely perfect for oily skin! I wore this and set it with the Sephora microbaked powder.. I wore it for 6+ hours and I looked perfect! No touch ups were necessary. 10/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was awful.  Again, I fell for the Insta-Hype on this product.  Went on super cakey and was impossible to blend.  Not easy to work with at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it.  Using my fingers is the best way for application for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this as a “primer” before applying bare minerals complexion rescue.   First, usually when I use complexion rescue alone, my makeup appears oily, eyebrow pencil melts, makeup is not fresh looking.  Danessa myricks balm powder is iT! I went to San Francisco for the day and had used this for the first time. My “face” stayed on and stayed put ALL DAY. Literally from 10AM to 9:30PM. Makeup did not need to be touched up at all.   This product is now a staple. Period!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I NEVER write reviews… this is hands down the best product I’ve ever used on my very oily skin! I have acne/rosacea prone skin and this product was non irritating and left my skin matte for hours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was influenced and got this because the TikToks were so awesome - the product is not awesome though. I will be returning.  -Yellow undertones in the lightest shade -Go a shade darker than what you think you need, it goes on lighter and did not oxidize into a darker shade -Highlighted my pores, dry skin patches, and other imperfections with pigment concentration in those areas -Texture is not for me, I felt like my skin couldn't breathe  I'd definitely consider the translucent balm-powder in lieu of the light since it did even out my skin but did nothing for my texture. I think the translucent would make an awesome primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product did exactly what it’s supposed to. I wore is to Disney World every day and it lasted all day long. The reason I gave it only 4 stars: the smell. It’s awful. I hate to say it but it smells like Raid (insect killer).

reviews.review_title: Something that actually does what it’s supposed to
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. Keeps my foundation from pooling and sliding off my oily skin. You don’t need much. I put it on over a sunscreen primer and it’s perfect. No bad skin reactions to my sensitive skin either.

reviews.review_title: Worst Foundation I have ever tried.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is horrible on so many levels. 1) It looks cakey and clings to dry spots I never knew I had. If you have super oily skin, this may be for you. I have normal/combination skin and it was not working. 2) Not long wearing. I tried it with my usual primer and setting powder. The foundation wore off and separated within hours. I was embarrassed at how I looked and wanted to hide under my desk at work. 3) The coloring is way off. The color that is in the pan applies at least 2 shades lighter. I looked like a 90s goth even though the foundation looked 1/2 a shade darker than me in the pan. There can be some pluses for some people (not me). 1) Some reviewers had settling in their lines. I didn't have that and I usually get that in my smile lines. I'm in my early 40s so I have smile lines and under eye lines. There was no settling in either. 2) The coverage is a solid medium. Some reviewers have said the foundation is light coverage but I used a damp beauty blender (as shown in the demo video) and got medium-full coverage. Do not try to build this up, you will look bake a cake face.

reviews.review_title: Looks pretty if done right but clings to dry spots
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you use a damp sponge it looks very pretty. But if you use a brush or too much product it clings to every dry spot and tends to look worse as the day goes on. I wish it was a one and done product but you have to do a lot of skin prep to make it look the way you want it to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wasn’t a fan of the texture and how it set on the skin. It felt like Vaseline and just didn’t dry down. Hard pass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unless you have perfect skin this isn’t it. It’s definitely if you want a VERY natural finish. For the price you’re off better just putting on some moisturizer ￼

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Used my elf grip primer and elf poreless putty primer first; then applied this with a flat top kabuki. 1st photo is 6 hours after application. 2nd photo is another day right after application. No filter!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I dab it in areas that I get oily and want less shine as a primer. It’s amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG - this is a game changer. Keeps my oils at bay, makeup looks as flawless at the end of the day as it did that morning.

reviews.review_title: Unfortunately not a staple for me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All these “wow” videos are clearly overhyped. I feel like I’m being duped by SM marketing.  The shade range is way too orange for brown skin and should not be an issue with a BW creator. It’s does emphasize texture especially if you have some dry areas. It clings and flakes.  I really wanted to get the next  color 9, but the shade 8 I have doesn't perform well enough for me to try again.  I want to like this so bad and have looked at every video on how to apply it. One pro, is it did last long. So if you can find your right shade and a moisturizing primer, it might work for you. Hopefully, I find a REAL tutorial and can keep it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this so bad, but every way I try it- it sucks! It highlights all of my pores, no matter how I prep my skin. It didn’t look good under makeup, as foundation itself, or on top of foundation. I wish I would’ve returned it while I could.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I never do reviews but I just had to this time.  When I say the my oily/combination skin stays matte all day. I mean alll day.  There is no oil break through and my makeup looks just as fresh as it did 12 hours earlier.  I don't even have to wear a foundation on top of my shade 10.  I just put on a setting powder.

reviews.review_title: Good formula but poor choices for fair skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very good product, but beware it’s mostly silicone.  It does control oil for those where that’s a concern.  However, I dinged a few stars because the color selection is terrible.  Number one is for the fairest of skin.  I am fair to light and number 3 was the best match, though too yellow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely incredible. I have oily skin and I work outside. And before my make up was running off in the Florida heat. Now I can wear this underneath all of my make up as a primer and my make up doesn’t move all day. My face doesn’t get oily like it used to and my skin stays hydrated all day. 10 out of 10 would recommend this 1 million times over.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so disappointed in this product. I bought this impulsively based on a tiktok I saw and thought this would be perfect for doing a quick base for work. this clings to my dry spots so bad and makes my oil way worse. the color was spot on but that was about it. tried to give it multiple tries using different primers, moisturizers, bases and it still looked just as awful. sticking to my too faced born this way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this balm! Great for the no makeup makeup looks. I’d prefer this over a bb or cc cream. Gives a bit more coverage than those. Covers up my acne and dark spots

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Of course I bought this cause I saw it all over social media.  The fair skin tone was sold out so I took a chance on the universal one.  The balm feels like a light Vaseline in the pot but feels like almost nothing on your skin.  As I applied it I watched my skin texture smooth out and my redness decrease as if I was watching a photo app filter being applied to my face.  I’m convinced someone sold their soul for the recipe to create this miracle product.  I’m very happy with the universal version but I can’t wait till my skin tone is back in stock to try that too.  I genuinely don’t need it cause the universal is perfect for me, but I’m mesmerized and curious.  If this ever gets discontinued you’ll find me revolting outside Sephora with a pitchfork.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: You will either love or dislike this product. My oily skin sisters this is a game changer. A colored balm left white dots in my pores, but the translucent has no color and is perfect. No oily skin, no face touch ups. My skin looks flawless from morning until night now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried. Boy I tried. I applied with fingers, a brush and a beauty blender￼. I tried applying it a few different times to see if it was may be the tools I was using. But this clung to every pore and sat on my skin in such a way that it made my skin look worse skilooterrible￼made my skin look terrible￼ it made my skin look terrible

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: horrible product. left my skin looking dry and patchy. do not recommend to anyone who has texture or any dryness

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. It literally sits in your face like skin. I like to pair it with a primer. I conceal first where I want more coverage and go in with my fingers to add the blurring balm powder. The make up stays!!! This is my fav!

reviews.review_title: Tired of the tik tok hype.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this because I am easily influenced. I feel like these influencers are lying to us. This is so thick and oily and sits on top of my face, if I touch my face it will move around :( it breaks up around my mouth. I've tried numerous foundations in my life and this is one that makes me feel uncomfortable because it feels like I'm wearing a mask on my face.  It's super heavy. For being so heavy it isn't even full coverage, it's medium. Building it to full coverage makes it look and feel even worse. It looks horrible on its own, which is how everyone on tik tok is saying it should be worn. For the dewy look but honestly if I didn't set it with powder it would rub off everywhere. I will say that this foundation does look better over time. After an hour or more it starts to set in and act less like a greasy mask, but it still cracks and separates in some areas. I'll tolerate it given I've tried it so many times to see which way it will work for me, so I can't return it anymore. I also only kept this because it's an EXACT color match for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It definitely blurred a little, however in terms of being a good base and balancing oil it was a fail. I was so excited to try this! I have combo skin and get oily typically only in my T zone. This gave my shine everywhere!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So obviously on the skin in natural light!! Clings to anything, despite a serious moisturizing prep and two different applications. Very disappointed, especially given the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lifesaver if you have oily / combination skin, a little goes a long way. Too much might make your skin look dry or ashy. This also keeps my makeup all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is a mix of powder and balm. When applied on the skin, it leaves a visible residue. I do not recommend if you have normal-dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried this product so many ways and it looks so bad on your face.

reviews.review_title: No shade for me! I love this though
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The universal shade is beautiful as a primer. This will keep your oils gone for the whole day it’s kinda wild. However, I just don’t have a shade in this. I’m light skin with neutral to cool undertones, therefore there’s no shade that would work for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I very must did not like this product. It’s gritty going on and made my makeup look worse.

reviews.review_title: Not yummy or blurring on me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell for another regrettable TikTok sensational product. This sat on top of my skin, didn’t cover anything, didn’t blur whatsoever and despite my decent abilities to match my colors online, didn’t come even close.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know if I’m using this wrong or what but it is terrible. Does not blend well at all on my oily skin, with or without primer. I’m trying to love it because of all the hype but I’m giving it one more try before returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have finally found the answer to my oily skin! I have the kind of skin that starts producing oil an hour after my makeup application even with mattifying primers, translucent powder to set AND a mattifying setting spray. I’m now going on 4 hrs and my face is completely matte! I’ve seen other people say that they use this as a primer under their foundation but I used it as THE foundation and it’s total perfection. Buildable coverage so you can either go for the ‘no makeup’ look or a full beat.   7 is my exact color match! I’m so ecstatic about this product I could cry! It’s literally the only foundation I’ll be using from now on and I hope they never change the formula or stop making it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have combination but leaning dry, personally, i think this is just an okay product, i gave it 4 stars mainly cuz of the magic of turning into a powder, but for the most part? eh…im not too crazy impressed, now my pily skin peeps may have a better experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this twice and I’m in love. It’s good for my combo skin. Makes my face look even. My favorite for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible oily product. Doesn’t look flattering on. 10/10 do not recommend if you have any texture to your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only used this product for a day, and maybe I should have considered using longer. I felt no need to because I knew what I was looking for and unfortunately this did not work for my skin that is problematic. I have acne- prone skin, acne scars, hyperpigmentation, and textured skin. When applying it matched my skin color perfectly but it took quite some time to work the product onto my face I tried different brushes, fingers and      a sponge. The product looked patchy, attached to areas of my face that were dry, enhancing the appearance of pores and looked streaky I had to play around with my face for far longer than I normally would. I couldn’t build the product neither and it had little coverage.   However I do believe this is a great product for skin as I saw it does have some benefits but this would be perfect for people who have very clear, bright and healthy skin who are looking for a light coverage to already enhance their clear non textured skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So hey! This thing is amazing! Like what sorcery is this?? I was LESS oily by the end of the day. Definitely WOC friendly and I highly recommend. This will be my new go to for every day “no makeup” makeup. Ahhhh I’m so excited for this. Thank you Ms. D!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s ok - clings onto dry spots and settles into fine lines. Other than that it looks decent from far away

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Mostly everything that trends on tik tok doesn’t live up to the hype. I have to give this a big ol yikes. Texture-application-finish-quality. All big nopes. Save yourself

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the universal figuring at worst it would mar a good primer… I really don’t get it. It’s oily and doesn’t melt in at all. Half an hour later my face is still slick with no noticeable “blurring”  - can’t imagine trying to put makeup over it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not my favorite. Looks dry and clingy when I first apply it, but after it settles into my skin it looks beautiful. I want to keep trying it and see if I like it paired with other things. It might just not be right for what I like in a makeup product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Decided to try it after one of my fav mature TikTok’ers raved about it. Ugh. Just awful. The color options are horrible and the light neutral made me look dry and chalky. It settled like crazy in my fines lines and made my normal/dry skin look even drier than usual. Definitely do not recommend.

reviews.review_title: Better if oily skin def not for dry skin babes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a shade level 2 Not 5!! The only issue I really have with this product is that you CAN NOT SKIP SKIN PREP. I always do my skin prep before my make up but if I’m running late and have no time this isn’t my go to bc It does get patchy and drying to my skin without moisturizer. I have combination skin so I didn’t think a balm would have a drying effect on my face. I think I love my fenty tint a more even tho you definitely should prep before using that too it’s more hydrating than this formula

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this after seeing and reading the great reviews, but it settled into every pore making them even MORE noticeable, rather than blurring them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not sure if it’s just the one that I got but this smelt horrible! I was really looking forward to trying it but the smell was too strong so I didn’t feel comfortable putting it on my face. Smelt like flat out chemicals

reviews.review_title: A great foundation for the oily girls
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok this is amazing for oily skin BUT you must have exfoliated and hydrated skin. It’s best to press in with your hands so it melts into the skin. You can prime with it or wear it alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to primer. This is a game changer! I have used it on myself and clients that are oily and dry and the results are amazing. I have been on set for 12 hour days and had to do minimal touch up on myself and clients

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the real deal! I love the texture of it going on, super velvety and blends like a dream! Even once it dries down it's super comfortable, and it literally kept my face matte for 10 hours! The tinted shades are also gorgeous as highlight/contour, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited for this product and I wish it worked for me. I used my regular skincare routine and applied it as a foundation with my hand. It accentuated my dryness and was sitting on top of my skin instead of melting in. With so many foundations on the market that do work for me there is no sense in trying to make it work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so revolutionary! I’m so obsessed with how amazing my makeup looks even hours later. If you’re considering trying it, DO IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: On days where I don’t want a super heavy base I love the balm powder because it gets the job done beautiful and it feels lightweight. It is also a great primer for your clients with oily skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: maybe I'm using this wrong... This product does absolutely nothing for me.. the consistency is oily, I rub into my skin and it turns into this dry/oily film that clings onto every dry patch on my skin offering not even light coverage. I can't even use this as a primer because the texture it leaves my skin is sooo unflattering. I'm so disappointed, this might be the last time I buy something impulsively from tik tok.

reviews.review_title: A new staple in my kit & perfect for oily skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love to use this product on long set days or when I have shoots with models in outdoor settings. I find this product helps control oil & shine in these settings better than a traditional powder. I also love that this product is undetectable on the skin & keeps skin looking like skin, a problem with some powders is that after layering or reapplying in hot settings can make the face look cakey. The formulation of this product is perfect for these settings & especially for oily skin. It gives the face that blur & shine-free finish you expect from powder with the added bonus of controlling oil with this product's hydrating ingredients. Something you just cannot get with a powder. As a Makeup Artist who works with a lot of different skin tones the translucent is my staple as it works on literally any skintone! This product is also great for male grooming as it's undetectable irl & in flash photography. For personal use I'd recommend using the provided applicator to scoop/apply the product & the use of your fingers/hands to warmup/blend the product into the skin. For my fellow professional mua's I'd recommend using the provided applicator to scoop the product onto a palette & apply with a synthetic flat brush onto the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for something for my professional makeup kit that would smooth texture and blur the skin without a drying effect or that wouldn’t pill up under my dewy makeup I use. I am so impressed with this balm powder! It’s now a staple in my kit.

reviews.review_title: Yes, it’s great, once you learn how to use it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product took me a while to figure out how it works for me, but after some trial and error, I can say that it’s the best mattifying primer I’ve ever used! It truly does appear to get more matte the longer you wear it and I’ve never used anything like it! It’s the only product I’ve ever used that allows me go without powder. Now, I can’t really wear it alone as a foundation, i use it as a primer. And that’s because it doesn’t look the best on textured skin (dry, flaky, or large pores.) if it’s used alone. But if it’s underneath liquid foundation, it looks great. So here are my tips, exfoliate and moisturize well before use. And apply with a sponge if you feel like the texture is a little gritty for you. I hope that helps!

reviews.review_title: Great product just not for my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I Think this is a great high-quality product And I could see it working well for others however it didn’t work for my skin. Just for reference i have fairly Large pores. It is super smooth and lightweight!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been testing the yummy skin blurring powder on shoots and I love using it under foundation as a primer. It sweeps on beautifully with a brush or I tap it onto the skin using my finger in areas where I want to blur pores or provide a base to reduce shine. A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not just a powder this fills in fine lines and pores and gives your skin the smoothest finish obsessed

reviews.review_title: If your pores are visible get this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is like no other . As with all Dm Products I am amazed at how different it is. This gives my skin the smoothest finish and fills in my pores completely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love using it for editorial shoots to cover some skin imperfections after applying foundation. Looks much more natural than a concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I use the translucent shade as a primer and it's such a great product. It's truly innovative and it blurs my pores before applying my foundation. It also helps reduce the oily tzone issue. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Life changing! A must have for sure!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are thinking of trying Blurring Balm Powder this is your sign to RUN, not walk RUN!! She has become my go to in my complexion routine, especially with my acne prone combo to oily skin. When I need my look to last all day I know I can count on this product.As described she is multi purpose, buildable and so very easy to work with. I am Shade W7 and blends in like a yummy dream. The amazing blurring and oil control formulation is perfect alone, over or underneath other cream/liquid products.   My favorite way to apply for a blurring affect is to use my fingers and will build coverage with a brush or a sponge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin, with large pores and wow- this is the worst foundation for me and my skin type. It immediately settled into my pores and then turned cakey. Highlighting all my texture and issues.  Later in the day it separated and somehow looked even worse. I’ll be returning this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The addition of the Universal Balm Powder has been everything I didn’t realize I needed in my makeup routines! Not only does it blur but it really keeps oils in check ALL day! It’s literally the fine wine of makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to is the translucent shade as a base before I apply any foundation. Use a tiny tiny amount and buff really well. This acts like a primer for your foundation. Can be used then across the top really lock it in place. Again, use a tiny amount! One pot will last you forever.  Also beautiful blended across the skin as a single layer of coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I dont know why I didn’t fight every urge to buy this. I just KNEW it wouldn’t be good for mature/textured/dry skin but I just couldn’t help myself. I got caught up in the hype! Dont make the same mistale as me. It clung to every dry patch I have and my skin looks even more mature and dry than before. This is not for anyone with problematic skin. I would argue its only for people with normal or oily skin at best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely stunning! Smoothes out my skin and is perfect for an everyday where by its self! Try the dewy serum underneath for a little glow!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve put down all my other foundations since getting the blurring powder. It really does keep me matte all day (I have combination skin) and the finish is gorgeous and skin like. I apply either with my fingers for a quick look or with a medium size blending brush for more precise application. It looks beautiful both ways. If you love skin that looks like skin, you’ll love this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been looking for a product that I can control whether it looks like a natural skin finish today but tomorrow I want my skin to look a lil more full coverage in (1) product! This is IT! it’s beautiful! And does not feel heavy on the skin. I also have a deeper shade to bronze and shape the skin for dimension.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

This is my holy grail product, it’s great alone and super versatile. I’ll use it before my foundation, after, or alone. I think this is the best product of 2022, I tell everyone I meet to buy this. reviews.review_title: Summer Skin Must for all Types
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Blurring Balm Powder is a must in my kit year-round now, but has become an important staple in my summer skin. Superpower ingredient Upsalite really does wonders for smoothing out skin and keeping it matte without the need for additional powdering. The balm easily melts into the skin using your fingers, or create blended and buildable coverage using a sponge or brush. A little goes a long way and mixes well with all DMB products. Universal makes a wonderful primer with invisible matte finish. With the all the shades, there are so many possibilities from eyes, lips, under-eye brightening, contour, complexion, etc.  TIP: Keep the container closed when not in use and click your spatula back into place after every use.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my makeup routine.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re looking to achieve a beautiful glass skin, look no further. The yummy skin balm is definitely an innovative cream powder that delivers a soft and natural coverage to your skin without leaving it greasy and or heavy. It is really like what Danessa said, “You’re skin but yummier”  The compact is beautifully package, light weight, and easy to slip into your purse. The balm is also great for touch up throughout the day as well, if you need it.  ***Great tip: if you want to achieve a beautiful and natural glass skin, scoop a bit of the products and a tiny small drop of the DMB Beauty Oil and or your favorite hydrating face oil, and then mix it. Once it is mix nicely, use your finger tips to blend the product onto your skin. If you’re not comfortable using your finger tips, swap it out for a round/triangular face puff. Press the face puff light onto your skin. Then. Lightly set it with powder and you’re skin will look like glass.   Good Luck and I know you’ll love this product as much as I do!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Given how many ways this product can be used and how novel it is, I had a bit of a learning curve with figuring out how to best use this product. However, I realized I can mix the universal/translucent shade into my liquid foundations to make them more long-wearing. I've used the Balm Powder several times for this hack, and I managed to make my makeup last for long periods of time despite eating, being out in 90ºF+ temperatures, wearing a mask, AND concealing a skin disorder (vitiligo). The balm powder has definitely become a staple in my personal and pro artistry kits for this reason. Using it as a mixing medium on myself helps it wear for a ridiculously long time without much budging. My clients also say their makeup lasts all night when I apply it on them!

If you have dry skin I recommend using the beauty oil and yummy primer serum for extra hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is such a nightmare trying to find a good actually natural looking no-makeup makeup product while having oily skin! I've tried everything from drugstore to Saie and this product is by far the best at evening out my skin tone and controlling my oiliness! I would absolutely recommend this to anyone looking for light coverage and/or oil control! You can also use this underneath your foundation for a more glam look! I'm in love. The shades are also very forgiving and melt into your skin. I recommend using your hands to blend it in as it goes on very creamy but turns into a powder. Doesn't dry skin out or cling onto dry patches either, I'm so impressed. Also packaging is SO CUTE!!! You need to try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After application you can see immediate results. I use this as primer, foundation, and setting powder. As a foundation I use a dense brush and for primer and setting powder I use small amount on my fingers. T-zone approved!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. So great as either a light foundation or a primer. Use this almost everyday for a no makeup makeup look to really have a little coverage that also controls my oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute go to product when I know it’s going to be a long day on set or running around. I use it primarily for blurring I’m my Tzone since I get the oiliest there.   Pro tip: if you ever have a Smokey eye gone rogue gently tap the brush into the translucent balm and buff/soften the edges!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: an absolute must have!!! I have always had issues with makeup lasting around my tzone especially because I still like a naturally glowy finish to my base, but don't want to resort to using only matte foundations. this has been a godsend for my oily areas, keeps the makeup lasting without look dry. not to mention these are so versatile, you can mix them with lipsticks, get different shades to use for different parts of your base routine. im obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very much a filter in a bottle type of product. It blurs and smoothes the skin without adding a lot of coverage, so its great to throw on for a no makeup day if you want to look a little more polished. I also like to use it as a primer, as it is very smoothing, and can cover up some of the rough patches of texture I sometimes get on my T zone. My one issue is that the formula is silicone-heavy (hence the blurring filter-like finish) which can clog my pores and make me breakout if I use it too frequently. Not everyone has this issue, so it may work wonders for you, but its definitely something to keep in mind if you are acne prone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you loved Yummy skin you’ll love Balm contour. I love how easy it is to blend and  build up the coverage. This is your skin but 10x better. No can really notice either. Although this is a “powder” it doesn’t necessarily leave you matte or dry. It’s a natural finish. It’s almost as if you did your skincare and left for the day. It also feels really smooth to the touch like a velvet that gives a natural glow. I’ve used this both with a brush and fingers and the coverage is the same. You get the same results. I reckoned getting the Yummy Skin serum if you want more of a glow underneath. This pair will give you the most beautiful land healthy glass skin.

reviews.review_title: Best cream to powder product out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am completely obsessed with this product! It's so easy to use and blends like a dream. It stays so well and looks so natural while controlling oil. I love to use this on myself and any bridal and film clients!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A must have in my daily makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin

This product performs its best on my skin when I take care of my skin. I like that it keeps my skin balanced through the day and looks gorgeous in photos too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not greasy like you would think.  IDK how she keeps coming up with these amazing complexion products, but I'm here for it.  Tip:  Spray your face with Set It Forever Mist and let dry completely.  Then dab the balm powder on any shiny areas!

reviews.review_title: Run don't walk to this product!

reviews.review_text: This Balm powder is like no other! I love to use as a primer before foundation to create longevity & ZERO shine! Run don't walk to buy this!

reviews.review_title: Works, but it made my face itch like crazy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color match was very good for my skin, even though I have a neutral undertone. The product definitely keeps the oil in check if worn under a foundation. When I wore it alone, it didn't wear all that great. I had to give it a 3 because it is NOT sensitive skin friendly. I could definitely feel the product on my face because my skin was itching the whole time I was wearing it. I know that it wasn't any other product, because this was the only one that I had not worn before. For reference, MAC studio fix foundation also makes me itch. So, if you have sensitive skin, this may not be the product for you.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my professional kit!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A makeup artist dream and everyone in between! Balm powder is a staple in my kit!! For my oily girls this product in universal is great to act as a primer. I also like Shades 5&7 to warm up the face when I only have 15 mins to get ready! She acts as a balm and dries down to a powder. What more could you ask for?? For my dry skin girls, don’t get it twisted. The consistency of this product is going to work well with your skin paired with yummy skin serum. She does not adhere to dry patches instead nourishes them! I find she does not clog my pores and has a smooth seamless finish. She’s a staple, she’s a queen!!!

reviews.review_title: Run don't walk to buy this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It only took me 1 time to use the Balm powder to see instant results! I used it as a primer prior to wearing my foundation. Normally I would get shiny but with the Balm powder, after time passes, it gets better at controlling shine! Miracle in a container!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is beyond anything I’ve yet to try. Less is more! There is an attached scoop to distribute the appropriate amount for your entire face. My favorite way to use it is as a matte skin tint for lightweight coverage, or a half scoop mixed in with my foundation for that all day oil control. I sweat less because of the Upsalite! It reads what your skin needs and mattifies appropriately. If you’re oily prone, no need to use mattifying products prior; you will be more matte at the end of the day than at the start! If you’re dryer - Make sure you hydrate appropriately!! My fav is the Yummy Glow serum as a base. You cannot go wrong, if you use it right ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how smooth this product makes my skin look and feel. It really does “blur” the pores and even out the skin tone. My face makeup sits well on top of this product. I usually start with some serum first, then add a bit of this on top. You can add more if needed and it doesn’t effect the outcome of the look. I really love how versatile this product is. It does have a light fresh scent which I really enjoy - but it fades almost instantly and doesn’t irritate my dry sensitive skin. Definitely recommend!!

reviews.review_title: Balm powder is that girl, she’s so versatile!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

When the Balm Powder first came out and I bought the shade 1 I did an in depth review for 4 days using it on different ways (base primer, eye primer, setting powder, foundation, and mixed with a liquid foundation). I wore it for at least 10+ hours each day and one of the days I even did a 30 min. cardio workout in it and it still held up incredibly! The upsalite ingredient truly is incredible for keeping sweat and oils that naturally are produced through the day at bay. I cannot recommend this product enough to people of all skin types because there’s truly so many ways this can be used to work for everyone.

reviews.review_title: A perfect add on to your routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

This product for mature skins is heaven!

reviews.review_title: Before Listening to the Negative Ones, Read This!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For everyone who does not like balm powder, I can almost guarantee they are not using it to its fullest potential.  Do not limit this product to just a complexion product.  It is an entire face product.  First and foremost, make sure you prep your skin the way it needs to be prepped.  I have normal/dry skin, so I prep with the Yummy Glow Serum and sometimes the Danessa Myricks Beauty Oil.  When I first used this product, it did look dry on the areas of my face that were not properly hydrated.  After prep, literally go to town with it!  I love using shade 5 for the center of my face (I’m Danessa Myricks Yummy Serum Foundation 14W, Vision Cream Cover N6, NARS Cadiz, Pat McGrath M17, and Fenty Beauty 330) and shade 7 or 8 for the perimeter of my face.  I love using the Universal shade for a no makeup, makeup look when I want to smooth my pores and have a flawless complexion.  I love to mix the universal shade with my more dewy foundations so they can last longer on the skin AND look better on the skin.  I have used the universal shade  as my setting powder as well.  I’ll take a dense brush and tap it over my foundation to set it.  I will also take the Universal shade and mix it with my cream blushes/bronzers so they can last longer and blend even better into the skin.  I will use the universal shade as an eye primer (for oily eyelids), in my brows as a primer, and I have even used shades 7 and 8 on my eyes as eyeshadow and on my lips as a lip color and lip smoother.  The possibilities are truly ENDLESS with this product!  It is by far one of my favorite makeup products hands DOWN!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A product I love to wear just by itself especially when I’m on the go. Instantly blurs the skin leaving a natural finish. Keeps my oils at bay all day.  This product is also amazing as a primer before makeup. It gives your makeup a natural matte finish but will never dry you out. It adds hydration to the skin no matter how you wear it. I like to use my fingertips when applying this product, it helps the product melt into the skin easier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most unique product I have ever used.  Its secret ingredient - Upsalite - helps control the excess sebum (oil) that your skin produces through the day.  This means that your skin actually looks BETTER as the day progresses.  I have attached a before and after photo of my skin.  This is before and after a 4 hour round of golf in 90 degree heat and 90% humidity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

This is the only product to help my makeup last through the hot icky summer ! Also great for my fine lines which usually crease quickly with other primers ! When I’m feeling lazy the shaded balm powders are perfect without foundation they cover my dark marks beautiful while making my skin still look natural for a quick do and go look paired on top of the yummy skin serum is a match made in heaven !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have dry skin and I love mixing in a highlighter like tiara in to create more of a glowy finish to the Product. Also use this as an eye base or to brighten my inner corner! It’s so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with the Blurring Balm Powder! I’ve been using the shade “Universal” as primer in my T-zone, and it’s been really helping my makeup to stay put throughout the day, since I can be quite oily. I can’t wait to try more shades in this range!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so underrated, it’s so multipurpose and literally does what it says it blurs it makes the skin look amazing and I love the trick of blending your eyeshadow out with it to make the lines less harsh and more airbrushed. I love that you can use darker shades for contour it’s multi purpose and absolutely stunning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a unique little product, gotta say. It's economical - a little bit goes a long way! I liked the concept and cute little spatula that came with it. I wasn't crazy about how this sat underneath my foundation, but maybe the clear/translucent shade would work better. I am super pale and the fair shade is still slightly too orange on me. This was nice to try for summer though, it made a noticeable difference controlling shine. I will note the texture felt strange and greasy - it was tough to wash this out of my foundation brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of those things that works for people that already have flawless skin, if you have blemishes , texture , etc. this won’t work. i had to return it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The hype was all fake. This product is trash and didn’t work for me. It made my skin very dry and patchy. I used it different ways just to make sure, and with very little Frutal efforts it does not work. Returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Good as a foundation for oily skin. Works perfect with her yummy primer for glowy skin that doesn't look shiny. Has real longevity and looks good at the end of a long day. Works well with cream or power products over the top (blush, bronzer, etc.).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not really a fan doesn’t do anything plus the smell :/ I cant stand it. Not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally don't like to spend that much on one item, but I was intrigued. Purchased online, wasn't sure about shade/texture. I LOVE THIS! It covers like everything but feels like nothing and it lasts ALL DAY for me.  This is the ONLY product I have EVER used that did not let my grease show through in 2 hours (like most products.) However, no greasiness in 4 hours, not even 6 hours!  I don't even need a primer (well, I think primers are a huge waste of money anyway - they've never done anything for me!!) You get a lot of product too and a little goes a long way. I highly recommend this, especially for those with oily skin. I can't rave enough about this product!!

reviews.review_title: LOOKS LIKE A FILTER IN REAL LIFE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I almost never write reviews but this balm blurs your pores and it looks like a filter in real life! It photographs beautifully and it blends so easily with a beauty blender. I give it 4 stars becaue it’s a little messy to apply at first. I bought Shade 3 and 5 and mixed them to create the perfect shade. I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you are like me and only read the first couple of sentences ever review read this! If you have extremely oily skin with enlarged pores do not purchase!! After seeing several Beauty influencers touting how wonderful this was for oily skin I sucked it up and bought it, even though I already had doubts. I live in Florida where humidity is pretty much year-round and summers are brutal! I have extremely oily skin with enlarged pores. The beauty influencers I follow have oily skin and enlarged pores as well. Apparently they don't live in a high humidity State like I do. Lesson learned on that one. This stuff found pores I didn't even know I had! It looked like craters all over my face. And not even 30 minutes later my skin was not just oily it was greasy! This is why I am such a supporter of MINIs. This has been my #1 REGRETTED Purchase of 2022.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does what it says: oil control. I really wanted to love it but it did not work on my skin. I have combination skin (oily in the T zone). I wore it a few times under foundation and realized that it dried out the area around my lips which in turn caused my foundation to crack. It could perhaps work for someone with a full oily face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am amazed by this product! I have an oily T-zone but not when I wear this! It doesn’t look like makeup. And it doesn’t melt in the Texas heat. It blurs wrinkles & skin spots. Will repurchase again & again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't know how to feel about this product. I like the blurring effect and it holds make-up like no other, but the undertones completely wash me out so I could never wear as a stand-alone. And on occasion she sticks to dry patches, but if my skin is well taken care of, it's smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m completely obsessed!! I have really oily skin and of course it gets worse as the day goes by. Not anymore. I’ve been using the Blurring Balm Powder under the Yummy Skin foundation and it keeps my skin matte the entire day, actually by the end of the day it’s more matte then when the day started. I also use it on clients and it keeps them matte during weddings

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had to try this after watching a review by a YouTube Influencer.  I took a chance and purchased the shade 8 instead of the universal shade.  I figured that it should be light enough to blend in if the color was close.  Well, I am one happy woman!!!    I used it as a primer under a powder foundation on a day where the temperatures were 100+ degrees in the heat of the day.  I got hot and felt like I was about to melt at times.  My makeup, however, looked like I'd just put it on.  I did blot, but it was out of habit, not out of necessity and there was very little oil.  Usually I'm a grease bowl after three hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this product and tried it right away because I been so excited to try it. I love it! I have dry skin and I like matte coverage. This was recommended by an influencer I follow who said they have normal to dry skin and so I figured it would probably work for me. The march is perfect and it makes my skin look like a filter. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this my makeup stays all day with very little shine. But it doesn’t smell like kerosene when you put it on your brush. I love this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great for oily skin!! I have SUPER oily skin and I usually just wear concealer, because I can never get makeup to stay on my oily face. I'm not a huge makeup person, so I was hesitant to buy this but I am SO GLAD I did! I usually blot my face every hour, but I went about 8 hours without needing to. I did have to play around with using a little vs a lot, but found a good balance. I do get shiny, but it's a nice glow (which I've never had before!) Really wish I had this when I was younger and first learning how to do makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it’s very blurring and keeps my oils away all day and makes my makeup look smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this stuff is insane. my makeup usually looks pretty rough after about 3-4 hours and even worse by the end of the day. i have very oily but textured skin is it’s tricky for me to find makeup that is matte but doesn’t emphasize texture at the same time. i wore this today and after 8 hours, it still looks great! i honestly could tell you i just applied my makeup and you’d believe me. this balm doesn’t dry you out at all and had a great blurring effect while also keeping your oils in check. i highly recommend this to oily girlies (especially if u have texture).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my gosh. RUN don’t walk to your nearest Sephora and GET THIS MAGICAL STUFF. I don’t even know what to call it, but it’s literally amazing. It’s flawless coverage (easily full coverage with a small amount) that looks like your skin. Your face just looks airbrushed in the softest, healthiest way possible. Get it, you won’t regret it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BOMB product! Love it especially when combined with the new Milk matte primer but I can wear this alone or combined it’s great! I swear the more you wear it the better it sits on your skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a demo & review of this product via Tiktok/YouTube (beautybymj)This is one of the most innovative complexion products to release this year! This balm is a multi-tasked that can be used as a primer, a non-powder setter or as you complexion base. I’ve tested it as a primer and complexion base and it’s remarkable! It’s formulated with Upsalite, which helps too absorbs moisture, and it’s super blurring so it gives a soft focus finish. When I use this as my complexion base, I do set it with powder because although it does settle down to a velvety powder finish, it’s still I cream formulation that will transfer on hands or other absorbent surfaces, if not locked in with an actual setting powder. You can build coverage with this, using a denser brush, think Sephora Pro brush 70 or 80. My favorite way to use it, is as a primer! I’m oily/ combo, especially in the summer, and that fact that the upsalite continues to absorbs oils while it smooths over pores and the balm provides some color, it evens out my complexion, which results in me using less foundation! I even bought the Universal to use in my kit, as a primer because it’s THAT GOOD!! I will provide photos of me using it as a primer and as a foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I have combination skin that is more oily in the summer, and I live in a very humid climate. Makeup is usually sliding off my face if I don’t apply powder periodically throughout the day. I’ve worn this for several days in a row and my makeup has never looked better. I use it in place of foundation and apply concealer and powder under my eyes only. I wore it today for nine hours with setting spray and went for a two mile walk. My makeup still looked good enough that I didn’t feel the need to touch up! It also blurs my pores and texture better than any other product I’ve tried. I am obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new holy grail/ staple product. As I have approached my 30's my skin has become more oily/combination. Especially my forehead and t-zone. I'm always needing to powder my eyebrows and forehead even when I wear even the most matte foundation within the first couple of hours. Over the last several days I have used this under different foundations with different finishes and in this brutal summer weather to truly put this to the test. I have not had to powder my face once! Even my eyebrows don't start to get that glossed over look and stay feathered. I think the key to using the translucent shade is to use small amounts in concentrated areas, work it in with your fingers, and give it a minute to sit and sink into your skin before you apply your makeup as it can feel really slick and greasy when you first apply it. I've never seen my foundation or brow pencil look patchy with this method. 8 hours later, my face literally looked like I just finished my makeup. To all of my oily friends, you need this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love love love all of Danessa Myricks makeup! My 15 year old is ready to wear makeup! I’m introducing it to her as I have with my other daughters and with my granddaughters, my sister, my nieces, my cousins and with my friends! She is just fabulous

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wasn't sure what to expect, but absolutely love what I received.  The last few days have been brutally hot so just used a little of this and concealer.  The results were amazing on my skin and remained so through the rest of the extremely humid day. May not be for everyone but it certainly works for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but it doesn’t hold up against humidity or oily skin. It applies like a DREAM! I mean wow what an experience. If it was formulated to stay in place and not crease and slide I would LOVE this. It’s a relatively light coverage. I personally cannot see myself building atop this product to increase coverage out of fear it’s become a cakey mess. If you’re not oily and are looking for light to moderate coverage. This product is for you! If you’re an oily gal like me… it’s a hard no.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The mixed reviews for this balm kept me on the fence for several weeks. I caved and ordered it and am firmly in the Love It camp. It went on smoothly, didn’t break apart or cling to drier patches, and gave a semi-matte finish that held up on a humid 95 degree day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yep. Idk what magic this is but it worked better than any setting powder. It somehow controlled my oil while still making me look smooth and dewy. At work I always have to touch up with powder and not only does my oily skin break apart my foundation, but the excess powder makes it look simultaneously dry and cakey. A whole mess. Today I put this stuff on instead of powder and I didn't need to touch up a single time my entire shift. Never stop making this please!

reviews.review_title: Good for oily but not too oily
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great shade range. Loved the look. Then as it absorbed oil over the course of the day it looked a bit granular.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t write reviews usually, but I am so impressed with this product I bought 4, it goes on smooth doesn’t clog your pores. The coverage is amazing without that heavy feeling, and helps fill in wrinkles. I have every product under the sun, and this is by far the best one I have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am an older person and oily and don't like the way powder functions. I prefer a dewey look over matte. I don't know what is in this but it's magic to me. I use a primer, a dewey/radiant foundation and use this as a setting powder. It tones down the dew/glow and I don't get shiny....at all don't even need a touch up. If you have dry skin, I've been told it's all in the prep. I ordered universal the next time I may try one of the shades. I will be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only used this once but on my first use, I knew I loved it!  It’s light coverage, slightly buildable so I love this for a natural look. It also evens me out REALLY well.
